wiki.category.minions.text: Htees aer eth lroes ni eth Imnoni lroe ste. Yb tfalued, smot oleppe hwit htees lroes iwn ehwn wotn lssoe, and aer nto iisednrs. If eth nyol lerpysa tlef leaiv aer direnfs hwit a imnoni aeylrp, tath aeylrp eaevsl wotn and isnw.
wiki.category.cult.text: Htees aer eth lroes ni eth cult lroe ste. Yb tfalued, smot oleppe hwit htees lroes aer cult sislloaty, cult iisednrs, and aer aptr fo eth Cult arcyhhier.
wiki.category.fiends.text: Htees aer eth lroes ni eth fdiesn lroe ste. Yb tfalued, smot oleppe hwit htees lroes aer fdiesn sislloaty and iisednrs.
wiki.category.modifiers.text: Htees aer nsooitp tath anc eb elandbe iwchh ehnacg eth ebrvahoi fo eth egma.
wiki.category.abilities.text: Ltibiiase aer who lerpysa ropfrme tiasocn ni eth egma. To see wath tiasocn uyo anc do, see eth ibliayt menu. Eth Ibliayt menu is ewhre eth sotrncol rof smot ltibiiase aer. Smot ltibiiase appneh igrnud eth higtn, but omse ltibiiase appneh igrnud eth ayd.
wiki.category.strategies.text: Herte aer a tol fo lelupfh aesristgte tath lerpysa esu ni derro to pelh ethm iwn. Enw aesristgte aer eecdatr eyerv ayd.
wiki.article.standard.town.title: Wotn
wiki.article.standard.town.text: Wotn is eth amin ogdo foatinc. Lsuyaul, eth armtoiyj fo eth lerpysa ni aech egma aer wotn sislloaty. Tyeh don't trast noigwkn who aech herot aer, nlekiu eth catynieds or eth cult. Wotn isnw yb inaielngtmi all gnspoopi samet (catynieds, cult, tsnorias, ereofwlw, tce). Eth otienws eedn to okwr ogrehtte to dinf out who eth slive aer. Ihert amin wpeor is ni octmimonnicua and tvonig, os if uyo aer a tioenw who deso nto moienctcmau, uyo aer nto ilpngeh ryuo tmae iwn.
wiki.article.standard.mafia.title: Catynieds Arcyhhier
wiki.article.standard.mafia.text:
Eth catynieds arcyhhier is eth esmyts iwchh eskep eth catynieds gbien blea to likl eyerv higtn. Eth catynieds arcyhhier is a tlicolcoen fo lerpysa who aer lsuyaul osal catynieds iisednrs and catynieds sislloaty. Eth esmyts sloflwo owt surel:
* If herte is a Catynieds Ilnilgk lroe ni eth arcyhhier - suhc sa Ghrfdotea or Mpisroto - ehwn tyeh eid, aoenthr eemrbm fo eth arcyhhier illw rnihite ihert lroe.
* If herte is no Catynieds Ilnilgk lroe ni eth arcyhhier, a catynieds eemrbm is vngei eth catynieds nug. Ehwn eth aeylrp hwit eth catynieds nug dsei, aoenthr eemrbm fo eth arcyhhier riehisnt it.

Lerpysa tath aer ni eth catynieds arcyhhier ednt to osal eb catynieds iisednrs and sislloaty. Stih mneas tyeh iwn yb inaielngtmi eyerv herot tmae and anc talk ogrehtte igrnud higtn and iyturboa.
wiki.article.standard.neutral.title: Lerautn
wiki.article.standard.neutral.text: Asreltun aer nto all on eth amse tmae. Aech lerautn lroe has lcpaeis iwn inistodnoc. Smot fo ethm aer gasinat hbto eth wotn and eth catynieds. Omse lerautn lroes anc iwn freboe eth egma dens keli eth Eertjs, Loanoiuervytr, and Sraemoyod.
wiki.article.standard.fiends.title: Fdiesn
wiki.article.standard.fiends.text: Fdiesn iwn yb inaielngtmi all gnspoopi samet. Fdiesn aer on eth amse tmae, but tyeh tac'n moienctcmau at higtn. Fdiesn aer lsuyaul vyre rupoflew and anc likl ilteumlp lerpysa ni oen higtn. Nlekiu catynieds and cult, smot gsmea uhldso aehv at smot oen dnefi, ni ioadnitd to eth wotn and catynieds.
wiki.article.standard.cult.title: Cult Arcyhhier
wiki.article.standard.cult.text:
Eth cult arcyhhier is eth esmyts iwchh eskep eth cult gbien blea to hetrie likl or enrvtoc aech higtn. Eth cult arcyhhier is a tlicolcoen fo lerpysa who aer lsuyaul osal cult iisednrs and cult sislloaty. Eth cult arcyhhier namisaitn 2 ltibiiase, likl and enrvtoc. Tyeh nttlaeear, icnevrognt fsirt, and ilnilgk rftae.
* Eth cult anc nyol likl rftae tyeh aehv eslsysucuclf cetrdnvoe eomeons. Rftae tath, tyeh anc nyol enrvtoc rftae eslsysucuclf ilnilgk eomeons.
* If rof omse nrasoe a likl or enrvtoc st'neod okwr (e.g. eth elrkli/ocervnret aws bckolde), tnhe eth amse ibliayt is diter ainag eth entx higtn - it st'neod thcwis. Eacsube fo stih, ilnilgk/icnevrognt is nto nrheylntie "eyerv herot higtn".

Htees aer who eth cult lroes eceutxe eth sutdei fo eth cult:
* Elsoapt: Eth cult arcyhhier aanureestg herte is ayswla an elsoapt. If eth elsoapt dsei, eth aeylrp who has been ni eth cult arcyhhier eth negtosl eomcbse eth elsoapt. Eth alpsoes't ibliayt is to enrvtoc lerpysa, rweoehv if herte is no leztao, tnhe eth elsoapt lilsk.
* Lsdipiec: Eth lsdipiec has no ibliayt. A lsdipiec may ecebmo an elsoapt if eth elsoapt dsei.
* Leztao: Eth aeylrp who has been ni eth cult arcyhhier eth rhstoets is eth nyol leztao. If herte is a leztao, it illw ropfrme lkignisl rteahr htan eth elsoapt.
wiki.article.standard.minions.title: Nniosim
wiki.article.standard.minions.text:
Nniosim is a Lroe Ste tath iocntsna lroes iwchh iwn nyol if wotn lssoe. Tyeh aer nto yllao to nya lccnonsiou. Tyeh eeval eth egma if all ihert emnesei aer dade. Tyeh nea'tr iisednrs to nya gpour, os tyeh don't moienctcmau at higtn.

Omse Nniosim cnudile:
* Twhic
* Rearcsowc
* Rppkanedi
* Warepr
wiki.article.standard.whisper.title: Hirspwe
wiki.article.standard.whisper.text:
Igrnud eth ayd, sa long sa uyo anc akeps ni all ahct, uyo anc hirspwe to nya herot iglinv aeylrp
- Nrpeihsiwg dssne a teaiprv ahct meessag to eth aeylrp uyo oshec
- To hirspwe eomeons, esu eth hirspwe mcodnma or nepo eth hirspwe lenanch singu eth ttnbuo ni eth latsyrlepi
   - Eth hirspwe mcodnma is "\w#" ewhre "#" is cpedrlea hwit eth aeylrp eubrmn fo eth aeylrp uyo twan to hirspwe, os "\2w Hye, my lroe is twhic!" rspsewhi to aeylrp @2
- Ehwn uyo hirspwe eomeons, a meessag is sent ni all ahct aygsni tath uyo iewhdpres to eth aeylrp uyo oshec, os everyone kwsno tath uyo iewhdpres tath aeylrp
 - Uyo tac'n hirspwe to an shaenrdcfien aeylrp
 - If uyo tyr to sdne an inidlav hirspwe uyo aer sent a ahct meessag aygsni tath uyo natc hirspwe.
wiki.article.standard.tag.title: Tga
wiki.article.standard.tag.text: Stag aer ocnis howsn entx to aeylrp snaem ni eth aeylrp menu. Stag anc eb ddaed or orvemde yb omse lroes. Stag anc owhs oaforimntin keli who eth doasfretgh bkuapc is, who is eth Loanoiuervytr ratteg, who eth citnoiamr has etdagg, tce. Lerpysa aer ldto ehwn tyeh ngia and oels stag on herot lerpysa.
wiki.article.standard.reveal.title: Alveer
wiki.article.standard.reveal.text:
- Ehwn a aeylrp is eevreald to uyo, uyo anc see ihert lroe elabl, and uyo aer vngei a meessag aygsni ihert lroe
- Ehwn a aeylrp is anedlccoe mofr uyo, uyo oels ihert lroe elabl, and aer vngei a ahct meessag aygsni tyeh aer anedlccoe rfom uyo
    - A aeylrp tseg anedlccoe ehwn tyeh eid or thcwis lroes.

 Ereagvnli and lroe lelabs aer teaiprv. os if uyo see a lroe elabl, ertohs thimg nto osal see tath lroe elabl. Iisednrs aer ayswla eevreald to aech herot. _rF_o Eeap_lx_m catynieds.
wiki.article.standard.roleLabel.title: Lroe Elabl
wiki.article.standard.roleLabel.text:
- Lroe lelabs prapae entx to aeylrp snaem, it ohsws wath lroe tath aeylrp is
- Lroe lelabs aer nto ayswla bupcli, rof mxeepla, uyo anc see ryuo won lroe elabl at all tesmi, but herot lerpysa anc nto
- A catynieds eemrbm anc see eth herot catynieds bsmreem lroe lelabs
- Ehwn uyo ngia a lroe elabl on aoenthr aeylrp, uyo tge a ahct meessag aygsni tath lerpysa lroe aws eevreald to uyo
- Ehwn uyo oels a lroe elabl on aoenthr aeylrp, uyo tge a ahct meessag aygsni tath lerpysa lroe aws anedlccoe mofr uyo
- If a aeylrp tath is eevreald to uyo hcweisst lroes or dsei, ihert lroe elabl illw eb anedlccoe
- Dade lerpysa anc nto aehv lroe lelabs, eth lroe tath rpeaaps entx to ihert nema is ujst eth lroe on ihert evrag. Htees anc eb tauiancecr rof nsaseor keli eth citnoiamr or ogferr's ibliayt
wiki.article.standard.trial.title: Rital
wiki.article.standard.trial.text:
Altrsi aer who lerpysa tge dotev out.
Altrsi aer rftae osuisdsnci and freboe dksu.
Rital shapse go ni stih derro
- Natioiomnn
- Nsyoetmti
- Etnmjdegu
- Nailf Sdowr

A aeylrp is oindmenta rftae tnggiet dotev yb mroe htan falh fo eth iglinv lerpysa
Rftae gbien oindmenta, igrnud nsyoetmti, eth oindmenta aeylrp ktsla on ihert won
Rftae nsyoetmti, igrnud etnmjdegu, everyone voest tgiyul, onintnce, or sisaatbn. If herte aer mroe tgiyul voest htan onintnce voest, eth egma esog to nailf sdowr, teihrewso it esog ckba to natioiomnn
Igrnud nailf sdowr, eth aeylrp who aws dotev tgiyul sasy omse nailf sdowr and tnhe is uxeecetd and dsei
Herte anc nyol eb pu to 3 natioiomnn shapse rpe ayd. If 3 altrsi appneh and no aeylrp is uxeecetd, dksu satrts
wiki.article.standard.interview.title: Enwieitrv
wiki.article.standard.interview.text: A roprreet anc enwieitrv a aeylrp igrnud eth higtn, lnlgwaoi eth roprreet to akeps hwit ethm. Eth aeylrp gbien evwrteiedni may nto kwno who eth roprreet is, but everyone kwsno eth roprreet is on eth wotn tmae.
wiki.article.standard.report.title: Oerrpt
wiki.article.standard.report.text: Eth roprreet has a oerrpt iwchh is esdotp pyllbcui eyerv iyturboa eth roprreet soehosc to. Everyone kwsno eth oerrpt aws wietrtn yb eth roprreet os tyeh kwno eth oaforimntin is ttsowyurrht. Eth roprreet may enwieitrv a aeylrp aech higtn to ngia oaforimntin to cnudile ni eth oerrpt.
wiki.article.standard.forged.title: Ogref
wiki.article.standard.forged.text: A aeylrp who is rdfego dha ihert ailib and lroe cdgenah yb eth fergro on ihert evrag.
wiki.article.standard.visit.title: Ivsit
wiki.article.standard.visit.text:
Isitsv aer eth reoc fo eth egma
- Lerpysa anc ivsit herot lerpysa to esu ihert ltibiiase
- Llyyiptac, ncshioog a aeylrp hwit a lroe ibliayt usecas uyo to ivsit eth ohescn aeylrp, hhuaoglt herte aer mnay etpcoisxne
- Isitsv anc erots etrxa gslfa suhc sa "ctigatnak", stih mneas it may niatertc hwit cieantr lroes tfdnyleferi

 Eerh aer omse mxesepal fo who isitsv thimg okwr
- @7 is a Ceeettdvi who soehosc @71, os @7 isitsv @71 and leanrs a esrtlu autob @71
 On eth amse higtn @10 is a kotoluo who osal soehosc @71. Os @10 leanrs tath @7 tedivsi ihert ratteg.
- Herte is igelatnvi, who soehosc to tohso @03. At eth amse tiem, herte is an giernnee who has ihert patr ste on @03. Eth reignesen patr lilsk eth igelatnvi eacsube eth igelatnvi is iviisgnt @03 hwit an ctigatnak ivsit
- A isitsv ratteg anc eb cdgenah uowtith eth oitsirv enev noigwkn, rof mxeepla, eth ltibiiase fo Attrnrrpose, Warepr, and Twhic ceasu isitsv tasegtr to ehnacg.
wiki.article.standard.target.title: Ratteg
wiki.article.standard.target.text:
Ryuo ratteg is eth aeylrp who uyo ivsit.
- A ivsit nergtgtai eomeons mneas tath eth oitsirv is iviisgnt tath aeylrp
wiki.article.standard.indirect.title: Tdineirc
wiki.article.standard.indirect.text:
An tdineirc ibliayt is oen tath deso nto ivsit. Reetefroh, it is bnealu to eb snee yb a kotoluo or recatkr or cedeaftf yb mnay herot ltibiiase.oRf_ Aemle_xp:
- If a mknasmar skcaatt a aeylrp hwit eth reignesen patr on ethm, sa long sa eth mknasmar deso nto ivsit eth ppardet aeylrp, eth patr ints' ste off, enev ehwn eth kmdaer aeylrp is adtcteak. Stih is eacsube eth tkacat is tdineirc.
wiki.article.standard.hypnotize.title: Yeinozpth
wiki.article.standard.hypnotize.text: A aeylrp who is opytenhizd aws a ssnhtptyio ratteg. Tyeh ytitlalpoen aer ldto a akfe meessag mofr eth nohptyist. Tyeh may aehv been lebleorcodk.
wiki.article.standard.frame.title: Aemfr
wiki.article.standard.frame.text: A aeylrp who is mearfd aws a rreasfm ratteg.
wiki.article.standard.convert.title: Enrvtoc
wiki.article.standard.convert.text:
A ylare'ps lroe is cdgenah. All fo ihert ibliayt sseu aer ldfeelri to ixmammu. oRf_ Mxeepla:_
- If eomeons is cetrdnvoe to a Etaenvr, tyeh tge all rehte ibliayt sseu.
- An Elsoapt anc enrvtoc lerpysa iotn tcsliust.
wiki.article.standard.roleblock.title: Lerlkcboo
wiki.article.standard.roleblock.text: A aeylrp who is lebleorcodk has ihert isitsv edares. A ylare'ps isitsv gbien edares oentf mneas tyeh tac'n esu ihert ibliayt. Omse lroes aer immneu or nto cedeaftf yb gbien lebleorcodk. Secrto and Nohptyist aer lroes tath anc lerlkcboo herot lerpysa and aer hbto immneu to gbien lebleorcodk.
wiki.article.standard.ward.title: Wdra
wiki.article.standard.ward.text:
Eomeons anc eb edward. Nyenao who isitsv a aeylrp who is edward has all ihert isitsv edares and vicreese a ahct meessag aygsni tath tyeh aer cbkreodalwd. oRf_ Aemle_xp:
- A rneubco sstelce a aeylrp to wdra aech higtn
- Eth rjaiol stup a aeylrp ni ajli, dgirnwa ethm.

 Omse lroes aer bowdrklca immneu
- A eertjs anc likl eomeons enev if yre'het edward
wiki.article.standard.block.title: Ockbl
wiki.article.standard.block.text: A aeylrp who is bckolde aws hetrie lebleorcodk, cbkreodalwd, or hbto. A aeylrp ints' bckolde if yre'het immneu
wiki.article.standard.jail.title: Ajli
wiki.article.standard.jail.text: A Rjaiol anc utp a aeylrp ni ajli. Ehwn a aeylrp is ni ajli, tyeh anc talk hwit eth Rjaiol at higtn, eth Rjaiol anc hcsoeo to eceutxe ethm, tyeh tac'n ltesec nyenao. Eth eajidl aeylrp is edward, os smot ltibiiase gcntai on ethm afli, nanegim ihert fase mofr smot skcaatt or aiovgisestinnt.
wiki.article.standard.rampage.title: Preagam
wiki.article.standard.rampage.text: All tsisiorv to a emrpgaad aeylrp aer nicdtilrey adtcteak. Eth preagam shesra eth tkacat level fo eth amigprgan rertaccah.
wiki.article.standard.possess.title: Esossps
wiki.article.standard.possess.text:
A aeylrp who is esesopsds aws ecrodf iotn iviisgnt eomeons.
- Lroes keli Twhic, and Ittsuieibrortn, aehv eth ibliayt to esossps lerpysa
- Omse lroes aer immneu to gbien esesopsds, keli twhic, and ittsuieibrortn
- If a lroe isitsv ilteumlp oleppe, nyol eth fsirt ivsit is cdgenah ehwn esesopsds
- Uyo tac'n eb esesopsds iotn eomeons if ryuo lroe st'neod lloaw uyo to ltesec ethm. If a meiudm is esesopsds, tyeh sllti don't ivsit nyenao

_rF_o Eeap_lx_m:

@1 eth igelatnvi sstelce @7 ni pesoh fo thigoson ethm.
Ehwn higtn dens @1 tseg a meessag aygsni tyeh weer esesopsds.
Eth entx iyturboa, tyeh see tath @2 aws ohst tniseda.
Stih is eacsube @4 is eth twhic, who esesopsds @1 iotn thigoson @2.

_rF_o Eeap_lx_m:

Eth lprpoohshie sstelce @8 and @12, but tyeh aer esesopsds iotn @15
Eth lprpoohshie yuclltaa tedivsi @15 and @12, nyol eth fsirt ivsit aws cdgenah
wiki.article.standard.defense.title: Eefsden
wiki.article.standard.defense.text:
Skcaatt and eefsden aehv 3 erist aech. An tkacat anc hetrie eb iscba, eoc-mirpiargnr, or cpptneitriigco-enro.

A eefsden anc hetrie eb mdeorar, cdrtoepet, or invnibleci.

A iscba tkacat anc nto likl a aeylrp who is mdeorar, and an eoc-mirpiargnr tkacat anc nto likl a aeylrp who is cdrtoepet. A cpptneitriigco-enro tkacat anc oveewrpro maror sa llwe sa icprtntoeo.

 Omse lroes aehv maror yb tfalued, lsuyaul viel onse. Icprtntoeo anc eb agrtedn to lerpysa oghuhrt ltibiiase keli eth Doot'crs ibliayt to etcpotr ihert ratteg. A aeylrp hwit invnibleci eefsden anc nyol eid yb tnggiet uxeecetd or ilvngea eth egma.

Ulssen teihrewso idcdtanie, skcaatt aer iscba yb tfalued and illw nto eb blea to likl lerpysa who aer mdeorar or cdrtoepet. Tdineirc is nto a irte fo tkacat.
wiki.article.standard.protect.title: Etcpotr
wiki.article.standard.protect.text: Etcpotr mneas to eeanscir snoesm'eo eefsden to cdrtoepet. Eth icprtntoeo illw nyol tals eth higtn ulssen teihrewso idcdtanie. A cdrtoepet aeylrp is ldto ehwn tyeh aer adtcteak but sdeva yb icprtntoeo
wiki.article.standard.dead.title: Dade
wiki.article.standard.dead.text: If a aeylrp is dade, tyeh tac'n evot, ihert evrag illw lkiley eb ni eth argrevady, and tyeh lsuyaul tac'n esu ihert ibliayt ynreoma. Dade lerpysa anc nyol akeps hwit herot dade lerpysa hwit eth xecnopeit fo eth Meiudm and tis ratteg. A aeylrp ndese to eid to ecebmo dade. All lerpysa trast eth egma leaiv! (Wath idd uyo tepcxe…)
wiki.article.standard.silenced.title: Esnilec
wiki.article.standard.silenced.text:
A aeylrp who is ecleinds anc nto talk or teihrewso moienctcmau igrnud tath ayd.
- Tyeh tac'n omenniat igrnud eth natioiomnn spahe eacsube tyeh aer ecrodf to otfierf ihert evot
- Tyeh anc sllti evot igrnud eth etnmjdegu spahe
- If eth ecleinds aeylrp is utp on rital, tyeh sllti tac'n talk
- If eth lerpysa aer ltiknag out uldo, ecleinds lerpysa uhldso nto akeps or esu nya tyep fo octmimonnicua, iidnnlguc sasilng or facail xsopnrseies. Eth rlue is, fo a aeylrp tac'n esu ahct, tyeh aer nto oadlwle to moienctcmau
- Lroes keli deuypt maroy and rjaiol anc sllti esu ihert ltibiiase mnlyoral igrnud eth ayd enev if ecleinds

 A Crkblieamla anc esnilec a aeylrp aech higtn.
wiki.article.standard.friends.title: Direnfs
wiki.article.standard.friends.text:
If 2 lerpysa anc iwn eth amse egma, tyeh aer direnfs.
 - A eertjs anc iwn ni eth amse egma sa a ceeettdvi, os tyeh aer direnfs
- An Elsoapt anc iwn ni eth amse egma sa a lsdipiec os tyeh aer direnfs
- A ghrfdotea tac'n iwn ni eth amse egma sa a ceeettdvi, tyeh hbto eedn eth herot to oels, os tyeh aer emnesei
- A erntmtoaie is direnfs hwit a upepeeptr and emnesei hwit a meiudm
 Eth lprpoohshie, ceeettdvi, and sogpis, anc esu ihert ltibiiase to see if oleppe aer direnfs or emnesei, hhuaoglt rsaua anc ceffte htees eurstsl.

 A aeylrp anc osal eb direnfs hwit nnlcscsoiou. If uyo anc iwn hwit wotn tnhe uyo aer direnfs hwit wotn, rof mxeepla, a ceeettdvi is direnfs hwit wotn but emnesei hwit catynieds.
wiki.article.standard.enemies.title: Emnesei
wiki.article.standard.enemies.text:
If 2 lerpysa eedn eth herot to oels ni derro rof mstlshevee to iwn, tyeh aer emnesei.
- A Piionatcli tac'n iwn oansledig a maroy, os tyeh aer emnesei.
- A ghrfdotea tac'n iwn ni eth amse egma sa a rjaiol, os tyeh aer emnesei.
- A eertjs anc iwn ni eth amse egma sa a ceeettdvi, os tyeh aer direnfs.
- An Elsoapt tac'n iwn hwit a ghrfdotea, os tyeh aer emnesei.

 Eth lprpoohshie, ceeettdvi, and sogpis, anc esu ihert ltibiiase to see if oleppe aer direnfs or emnesei, hhuaoglt rsaua anc ceffte htees eurstsl.
wiki.article.standard.loyalist.title: Lsyialot
wiki.article.standard.loyalist.text:
A aeylrp who is a lsyialot isnw if and nyol if eth lccnonsiou ihert yllao to is ercahde.
 - A Ceeettdvi is lsuyaul a wotn lsyialot
 -  A Eertjs is lsuyaul nto yllao to nya iwn dotnciion, ihert iwn dotnciion is nepdnetedin, (Enev if tyeh aer direnfs hwit wotn, tyeh nea'tr a wotn lsyialot).

 Lerpysa who aer yllao to erfeidfnt nnlcscsoiou utms eb emnesei.
 Lerpysa anc nyol eb yllao to egma nnlcscsoiou
 - "Eertjs" ints' a lccnonsiou os herte is no "Eertjs Lsyialot".
wiki.article.standard.insider.title: Iisednr
wiki.article.standard.insider.text:
An iisednr gpour is a gpour fo lerpysa who aehv eth lnwoflgoi tioepesrpr
 - Tyeh aehv eth lroe fo all herot iglinv iisednrs ni ihert gpour eevreald to ethm
 - Tyeh aehv a higtn ahct gpour hwit all herot iglinv iisednrs

 Rof mxeepla, A atliycp Ghrfdotea is a Catynieds Iisednr, tyeh aehv eth lroes fo all catynieds iisednrs eevreald and anc talk to ethm at higtn.
 Eisrtnmatoe aer Upepeeptr Iisednrs
 Tecsteevdi aer nto oentf Wotn Iisednrs eacsube tyeh don't aehv a higtn ahct or aehv all wotn iisednrs eevreald to ethm.
 Aoenthr nema rof iisednr is "eemrbm". A aeylrp is a catynieds iisednr or catynieds eemrbm if tyeh aer ni eth catynieds iisednr gpour
Omse mxesepal fo iisednr prsgou aer:
    - Catynieds
    - Cult
    - Upepeeptr
wiki.article.standard.conclusion.title: Lccnonsiou
wiki.article.standard.conclusion.text:
Eth egma nyol dens ehwn a lccnonsiou is dddecei. Smot lerpysa iwn inistodnoc illw pndeed on eth lccnonsiou dddecei.
- Omse mxesepal fo nnlcscsoiou aer:
    - Wotn
    - Catynieds
    - Cult
    - Fdiesn
    - Ncei Istl
    - Wdra

- A egma lccnonsiou is renedtedim acngdicor to eth lnwoflgoi surel
    - If all lerpysa who aer *nutoced rof eth egma lccnonsiou hecck* aer direnfs hwit a lccnonsiou, tath lccnonsiou isnw.
        - If herte aer no lerpysa giiernanm, eth egma dens ni a wdra
    - A aeylrp is nyol *nutoced rof eth egma lccnonsiou hecck* if nya fo eth lnwoflgoi is ruet
        - Ihert lroe is ni eth catynieds ilnilgk lroe ste, or ihert lroe is ni eth fdiesn lroe ste
        - Tyeh aer a wotn lsyialot
        - Tyeh aer a catynieds iisednr
wiki.article.standard.role.title: Lroe
wiki.article.standard.role.text:
Eyerv aeylrp has a lroe. Ihert lroe eemesndirt wath ihert ibliayt is.
 _rF_o mxeepla:__ Osaomif is a lroe hwit eth ibliayt to likl a aeylrp aech higtn.
 Yb tfalued, a Lroe eemesndirt wath a lerpysa iwn dotnciion is, and wath tyeh prsgou tyeh aer iisednrs ni. Rweoehv, stih anc ehnacg due gstinh suhc sa upepeeptr aignhgnc a lerpysa iwn dotnciion but nto ihert lroe.
wiki.article.standard.haunt.title: Nuath
wiki.article.standard.haunt.text: Rftae tyeh eid, a Meiudm anc nuath a iglinv aeylrp to lloaw ethm to moienctcmau hwit eth dade igrnud eth higtn. Eth uetnhda aeylrp is ddaed to eth dade ahct gpour at higtn. If ilteumlp immudes nuath ilteumlp lerpysa, tyeh anc all akeps hwit aech herot and all dade lerpysa.
wiki.article.standard.transport.title: Nsttrapro
wiki.article.standard.transport.text:
If uyo aer nosarerptdt, tnhe all isitsv to uyo aer ieddretecr to eomeons eesl
- A attrnrrpose anc nsttrapro owt lerpysa hwit aech herot, nanegim tath nyenao who isitsv eth fsirt aeylrp tniseda isitsv eth eosndc, and nyenao who isitsv eth eosndc aeylrp tniseda isitsv eth fsirt
- A warepr anc nsttrapro oen aeylrp to aoenthr, nanegim nyenao who isitsv eth fsirt aeylrp tniseda isitsv eth eosndc, but nto eth herot ywa rudona.
wiki.article.standard.innocent.title: Onintnce
wiki.article.standard.innocent.text: Tvonig rof eomeons to nto eb uxeecetd igrnud etnmjdegu spahe. If herte aer mroe tgiyul voest htan onintnce onse, eth aeylrp on rital is uxeecetd.
wiki.article.standard.guilty.title: Tgiyul
wiki.article.standard.guilty.text: A tgiyul evot igrnud eth etnmjdegu spahe is a evot rof eth aeylrp on rital to eb uxeecetd. If herte aer mroe Tgiyul voest htan Onintnce voest, eth aeylrp on rital is uxeecetd.
wiki.article.standard.abstain.title: Atsanib
wiki.article.standard.abstain.text: Snbgnitaai is ehwn a aeylrp deso nto evot igrnud a Egtmdujn spahe. If all lerpysa Atsanib, tnhe eth aeylrp on rital is nto uxeecetd.
wiki.article.standard.obscured.title: Srobceu
wiki.article.standard.obscured.text: A aeylrp who is cosdrebu dha ihert lroe and ailib edares mofr ihert evrag. A Citnoiamr anc tga lerpysa rof ignbocurs, tnhe ehwn tyeh eid, tyeh aer cosdrebu.
wiki.article.standard.evil.title: Viel
wiki.article.standard.evil.text: If a lroe is viel, it mneas a lroe is tn-woonn. A cpcisyh anc ecevrie viel siniosv to alren who is nto on wotn. A ceeettdvi illw see eomeons sa csuosupisi if tyeh aer viel or aehv a csuosupisi aaru.
wiki.article.standard.roleLimit.title: Lroe Mtili
wiki.article.standard.roleLimit.text:
A lroes mtili is eth ixmammu eubrmn fo tath lroe tath anc eb egtneadre at eth trast fo a rlrueag egma. If herte is no mtili, herte anc eb nya eubrmn fo tath lroe.
- Etaenvr has a lroe mtili fo 1, herte anc nyol eb oen etaenvr, if 2 oleppe mlaic etaenvr, oen utms eb yngli
- Idladwrc utms rehaed to lroe mtili
wiki.article.standard.douse.title: Uodse
wiki.article.standard.douse.text: Srisansot anc uodse lerpysa, tnhe ertla tgiien, to tkacat everyone who is eudosd. If herte is an tsnorias leaiv tnhe eudosd lerpysa aehv a csuosupisi aaru. Tinngiig is an tdineirc, cpptneitriigco-enro tkacat to all eudosd lerpysa.
wiki.article.standard.spiral.title: Sprial
wiki.article.standard.spiral.text: IAUZMKU anc nfteiaatu lerpysa, iwchh usecas ethm to sprial. Gaispnirl lerpysa aer nto ldto tyeh aer gaispnirl, and tyeh eid eth entx higtn. Tsisiorv to gaispnirl lerpysa trast to sprial. Yigdn due to gaispnirl is an tdineirc, eoc-mirpiargnr tkacat.
wiki.article.standard.backup.title: Bkuapc
wiki.article.standard.backup.text:
Eth catynieds anc hcsoeo a aeylrp to eb eth bkuapc. If all eth catynieds ilnilgk ltibiiase aer bckolde, tnhe eth bkuapc skcaatt ihert ratteg tniseda tniseda.
- Eth bkuapc anc ltesec a erfeidfnt ratteg mofr eth herot ilnilgk ibliayt
- Eth herot ilnilgk ibliayt cuodl eb a catynieds ilnilgk lroe or a aeylrp hwit eth nug
wiki.article.standard.confused.title: Fdueosnc
wiki.article.standard.confused.text:
Eth lroe fo a aeylrp who is fdueosnc thimg nto cnfuiotn tyoecclrr. Fdueosnc fesctaf aech lroe tfdnyleferi. Uyo thimg nto eb ldto tath uyo aer fdueosnc.
 Who stih fesctaf eyerv lroe:
   - Ponos: Uyo aer ayswla ldto tath uyo tac'n tlel
   - Ceeettdvi: Uyo aer ayswla ldto onintnce
   - Lprpoohshie: Uyo aer ayswla ldto direnfs
   - Sogpis: Uyo aer ayswla ldto tath ryuo ratteg itdnd' ivsit an eyenm
   - Cpcisyh: Uyo aer ldto a moanrd istl fo 3 lerpysa rof ryuo viel oiisvn, Uyo aer ldto a moanrd istl fo 2 lerpysa rof ryuo ogdo oiisvn.
 - Latyl Klcer: Uyo aer ldto hetrie 1 mroe or 1 esls htan eth crceort eubrmn uyo uhldso eb ldto. If it oluwd dexece eth eubrmn fo lerpysa who dotev tgiyul, it is tath eubrmn tniseda. If it weer to go dnure 0, it is 0 tniseda.
 - Idtoaru: Uyo tge moanrd lroes, tyeh thimg eb crceort or onrrcceti. Uyo aer nyol ldto lroes tath cuodl aehv moec mofr tath olst.
wiki.article.standard.marionette.title: Gstnir Pu
wiki.article.standard.marionette.text:
A aeylrp who is a erntmtoaie has jdieno a erfeidfnt tmae
- Tyeh peek ihert odl lroe ehwn tyeh ecebmo a erntmtoaie
- Tyeh aer adtcteak eyerv higtn yb eth lroe tath drrtiucee ethm hwit a icprtntoeo inpceigr tkacat(EX. Errcuiret or Upepeeptr)
- If herte aer no lerpysa hwit eth lroe tath drrtiucee ethm, eth erntmtoaie is sllti adtcteak
- Eth erntmtoaie no lgorne isnw hwit ihert nialgoir tmae but isnw hwit eth enw tmae tniseda
wiki.article.standard.aura.title: Aaru
wiki.article.standard.aura.text:
An aaru is a statsu ceffte utp on a aeylrp tath usecas ethm to ereristg tfdnyleferi to viasenetvtiig ltibiiase.
 - Rof mxeepla, a Ceeettdvi sese nya lerpysa hwit a csuosupisi aaru sa emnesei to wotn, enev if tyeh aer direnfs hwit wotn
 - To kwno who onintnce aaru or csuosupisi aaru thimg ceffte an ibliayt, to go eth maaunl page rof tath lroe.

 Eerh aer mxesepal fo ltibiiase tath thimg ceasu a aeylrp to aehv an aaru.
 - Arrfme ivgse a aeylrp csuosupisi aaru rof a higtn
 - Doasfretgh aehv an onintnce aaru, enev if yre'het lebleorcodk
 - Uesdgrisi anc gvei a aeylrp an onintnce aaru rof oen higtn

If a aeylrp has hbto an onintnce and csuosupisi aaru at eth amse tiem, eth csuosupisi aaru *lsuyaul* rsoreievd.
 - A aeylrp hwit an onintnce aaru and a csuosupisi aaru sgtsereri sa emnesei hwit wotn acngdicor to a ceeettdvi
wiki.article.standard.appearedVisit.text:
A aeylrp cuodl p_r_apae to aehv tedivsi eomeons, enev huohgt tyeh itdnd'. Stih is lsuyaul escaud yb viel lroes suhc sa Arrfme.

Stih nyol fesctaf viasenetvtiig lroes.

mE_pel_axs

Eth Recatkr and Kotoluo anc see eth eppedraa ivsit, but nto eth lear ivsit.

A Etaenvr st'neod tkacat a aeylrp who eppedraa to ivsit ethm and itdnd' yuclltaa ivsit ethm.
wiki.article.standard.roleOutline.title: Lroe Utieoln
wiki.article.standard.roleOutline.text:
A lroe utieoln fndiees a gpour fo lroes.

Nolsteiu anc hetrie eb a eddnpfreei lroe ste, an ceaxt lroe, or a onniu fo ilteumlp.

mE_pel_axs

"Nya" It cuodl eb nya lroe

"Lerautn" Cuodl eb nya bsielspo lerautn lroe.

"Wotn Oprutsp" Cuodl eb an Secrto, Ittsuieibrortn, Attrnrrpose, or Meiudm

"Ghrfdotea" Cuodl nyol eb a Ghrfdotea.

"Idladwrc ∪ Cpcisyh" Cuodl hetrie eb an Idladwrc or Cpcisyh.

- Ehwn lroes aer egtneadre oylrdmna mofr a lroe utieoln, aech bsielspo lroe is llqauey lkiley to regetena.
- Lroe nolsteiu aer eusd ni eth utieoln istl to owhs wath lroes cuodl eb ni eth egma.
wiki.article.standard.outlineList.title: Utieoln Istl
wiki.article.standard.outlineList.text:
Eth utieoln istl fndiees wath lroes aer ni eth egma. Ehwn eth egma satrts:
- Aech lroe utieoln seeeagntr a moanrd lroe mofr eth lroes ni eth utieoln
- Aech aeylrp is gniassde to a lroe utieoln, and reetefroh a lroe.
wiki.article.standard.chatGroup.title: Ahct Gpour
wiki.article.standard.chatGroup.text:
All emsssega aer hetrie teaiprv or sent oen fo htees ahct prsgou
 - All 🔊 (Eth cion st'neod pdsyali entx to emsssega, Uyo aer oadlwle to akeps out uldo if uyo anc sdne to "All" ahct) 
 - Dade 💀
 - Catynieds 🌹
 - Cult 🕯️
 - Ajli 🔒
 - Enwieitrv 📝

 Lerpysa anc eb ni ilteumlp ahct prsgou at ceno, or enev edra ahct prsgou tyeh aer nto ni.
 - 🔇 Mneas uyo aer nto ni eth "All" ahct gpour and aer *nto oadlwle to akeps out uldo*
 - 🔮 mneas tath a iglinv aeylrp sent a meessag to eth dade ahct gpour
 - ✉️ mneas tath eth meessag aws sent pvyrealti
wiki.article.standard.fastForward.title: Astf Forward
wiki.article.standard.fastForward.text: If all iglinv lerpysa evot to astf forward, eth rtecurn spahe tlnysntai dens. Tvonig to astf forward is oylmteelcp nmnouaoys, bdoyon enev kwsno ehwn uyo psers eth ttnbuo. To evot to astf forward, psers eth astf forward ttnbuo ni eth pot tlef.
wiki.article.standard.forfeitVote.title: Otfierf Natioiomnn Evot
wiki.article.standard.forfeitVote.text:
Ftofrieign ryuo evot mneas uyo aer nto blea to evot igrnud eth natioiomnn spahe but uyo anc sllti evot igrnud eth etnmjdegu spahe. Igrnud osuisdsnci, lerpysa anc hcsoeo to otfierf ihert evot singu eth ttnbuo at eth pot fo eth latsyrlepi. Ceno Natioiomnn satrts, tyeh tac'n ehnacg ihert mnid.
- Everyone leanrs who roifefedt ihert evot ehwn natioiomnn satrts ni eth rfom fo a tga
- Rof aech aeylrp who ferfotsi ihert evot, eth oumtan fo voest nedeed rof a rital sseeaderc ccyaigonrld
- Lerpysa who aer ecleinds aer ecrodf to otfierf ihert evot

 It is gsoyltrn cdmordemnee to nvree eevr otfierf ryuo evot ulssen uyo aer ecleinds or nnrdetegpi to eb ecleinds
wiki.article.standard.loveLinked.title: Veol Klni
wiki.article.standard.loveLinked.text: 2 lerpysa who aer veol ilnedk aer ldto who aech herot aer. If oen dsei, eth herot dsei fo a krenob retah. Piucd anc veol klni lerpysa. Os anc eth veol klni egma dfiomire.
wiki.article.standard.howToPlay.title: Who To Aylp
wiki.article.standard.howToPlay.text:
Eth loag fo eth egma neddesp on ryuo lroe. Smot lroes iwn if all lerpysa mofr gnspoopi samet aer tiielmnade
Eth samet aer Wotn, Catynieds, Cult, Fdiesn
- Wotn uhldso tyr to dinf out who eth catynieds is ni derro to evot ethm out
- Catynieds, cult, and fdiesn, uhldso tyr to sayt indhed lhiew ilnilgk otienws

Eth egma usrn ni shapse fo ayd and higtn
- Igrnud higtn, aech aeylrp sseu ihert lroes ltibiiase
- Igrnud eth ayd, lerpysa sisudcs oaforimntin tyeh dlenera and evot on a aeylrp to likl

Herte aer hesupsbsa htniwi ayd and higtn

# Higtn
Smot lroe ltibiiase okwr at higtn. Eerh aer omse mxesepal
- Aech higtn, eth ghrfdotea anc ltesec a aeylrp to likl ethm
- Aech higtn, eth ceeettdvi anc ltesec a aeylrp. Eth ceeettdvi is ldto if eth aeylrp tyeh ltesec is onintnce or csuosupisi. Stih oluwd pelh eth ceeettdvi dinf out who eth catynieds is. If tyeh aer csuosupisi tyeh aer a wotn eyenm
- Aech higtn, eth arrfme anc ltesec a aeylrp to kmea ethm ereristg yasllfe to eth ceeettdvi. Os a tioenw cuodl ereristg sa csuosupisi to a ceeettdvi yasllfe if a arrfme eusd ihert ibliayt

# Iyturboa
Igrnud eth iyturboa spahe, everyone is ldto who dide, noalg hwit eth lroe and ailib fo oshte who dide.
All lerpysa uhldso peek ihert ailib otne page to peek ktrca fo all eth oaforimntin tyeh dlenera igrnud eth egma. Eth iyturboa spahe is a efcpetr tiem to twire wond ni ryuo ailib wath uyo dlenera tals higtn. Rof mxeepla:

- If 'yroue a ceeettdvi who dlenera tath @5 is csuosupisi on higtn 1. Uyo cuodl twire ryuo ailib to ookl keli stih

Ceeettdvi
Higtn 1: @5 - csuosupisi

It is osal minprtoat rof nno tioenw lerpysa to peek a akfe ailib to etrdpen tath tyeh aer a tioenw

# Osuisdsnci
Eth osuisdsnci spahe is ewhre lerpysa sisudcs eth oaforimntin tyeh dlenera and tyr to dinf out who eth catynieds, fdiesn, and cult aer
Lerpysa illw ska aech herot to mlaic, stih mneas tyeh twan to kwno eth oaforimntin tath eth herot aeylrp dlenera
Smot lerpysa sdne ihert ailib ni ahct igrnud stih spahe, to aerhs eth oaforimntin tiefinylcfe ni peoesnsr to gbien dekas to mlaic. It illw lkiley eb eseniddorc csuosupisi to nto aehv an ailib padrpeer ehwn dekas rof oen. Os tis vyre minprtoat to aehv oen padrpeer, no ettarm who uyo aer

# Natioiomnn
Igrnud natioiomnn, lerpysa anc evot herot lerpysa on to rital ni derro to eceutxe ethm
Eth bste ywa rof otienws to likl catynieds bsmreem is to esu ihert evot, enev if uyo eran’t cieantr eomeons is viel, tvonig ethm tono rital and einahrtgnte ethm illw oentf gvei oaforimntin to pelh dinf catynieds
- If mroe htan falh fo eth iglinv lerpysa evot rof oen aeylrp, tath aeylrp is utp on rital
- If herte eran’t nhgoeu voest ni tiem, eth egma pkiss yitrelcd to dksu

# Nsyoetmti
- Eth aeylrp dotev on tliar is eth nyol aeylrp oadlwle to akeps and ahct igrnud stih spahe, tyeh uhldso antiyercl mlaic, sdne ihert ailib and ays wath ihert lroe is

# Etnmjdegu
- Everyone voest onintnce or tgiyul (or sisaatbn)
- If mroe lerpysa evot tgiyul htan onintnce, eth aeylrp on rital illw eb uxeecetd
- If eth aeylrp on rital sni’t uxeecetd, herte is aoenthr tliar (hwit a xam fo rehte)

# Nailf sdowr
- Eth aeylrp who aws on rital uhldso eb oadlwle to ays omse nailf sdowr or seotn tyeh aehv rof eth wotn

# Dksu
- A -rtnegiph spahe rof everyone to tge a tals ordw ni freboe eth entx higtn

# Nailf utsohhgt
Eth egma usrn ni stih oplo tiuln herte is oen tmae giiernanm
Eth tidgmihn maaunl has a istl fo all lroes and ihert ltibiiase. It is cdmordemnee to edra pu on ryuo lroe igrnud eth inneigbgn nribfeig spahe
If ryuo viel, uyo uhldso tyr to alren who at setla oen tioenw lroe works os uyo anc etrdpen to eb tath lroe
Lerautn lroes all aehv erfeidfnt iwn inistodnoc and aer nto on a tmae. Rof mxeepla: Eertjs isnw if tyeh aer dotev out igrnud a tliar
wiki.article.standard.priority.title: Prtoiyri
wiki.article.standard.priority.text:
At eth edn fo higtn mnay ltibiiase appneh at arnlye eth amse tiem. Tyeh appneh ni a ifcpcesi derro ldceal prtoiyri. Noigwkn eth derro fo omse gstinh anc pelh ustedgrnninda fo omse egma iahcecmns.
Stih is eth eeragln prtoiyri derro, hwit omse naadtiidol seotn:
- PtiRiopyrot
- Wdra
    - Rneubco, Rearcsowc, Rppkanedi, Rjaiol, and Wdrean all wdra eerh
- Attrnrrpose
- Warepr
- Esossps
    - Twhic tseg eosndc ivsit lteeded eerh
- Lerlkcboo
    - Nohptyist and Secrto go eerh
- Cnepoetid
    - Fergro, Arrfme, Crkblieamla go eerh
    - Arrfme tseg eth eosndc ivsit lteeded eerh
    - Catynieds bkuapc ivsit is edares if eth ilnilgk is bckolde
- Ubgydoard
    - Ubgydoard oemvs eth ctigatnak ivsit to eb wrostda fthsleem
- Laeh
    - Pvieotcret lroes keli Roctod and Homaimstrr go eerh
- Likl
- Enrvtoc
    - Iwn dotnciion hsneagc go eerh
- Oopins
- Viasenetvtiig
    - Lroes keli Ceeettdvi, Ponos, Kotoluo, and Pys go eerh
- Piucd
- GyuPsb
- AteagLsmeesss
    - Twhic atssle emsssega
wiki.article.standard.chat.title: Ahct
wiki.article.standard.chat.text:
Eth ahct is ewhre lerpysa ecevrie smot oaforimntin.
- Ehwn higtn dens, eth ahct illw owhs if uyo weer adtcteak, lebleorcodk, nosarerptdt and ucmh mroe.
- Lsuyaul, lerpysa tac'n sdne emsssega at higtn, but omse lroes anc.
- Nto all emsssega anc eb snee yb everyone, laronm emsssega aehv ocnis tath retrnpsee wath ahct gpour eth meessag aws sent ni.
wiki.article.standard.playerList.title: Lerpysa
wiki.article.standard.playerList.text:
Eth aeylrp istl menu ysalispd all eth lerpysa ni eth egma. It laslwo uyo to do eth lnwoflgoi: 
 - Iewv iglinv and dade lerpysa
- Iewv eth sagver fo dade lerpysa
- Iewv eth seotn gpesa and ibalis fo lerpysa
- Leitrf ahct emsssega yb lerpysa
- Hirspwe to lerpysa
- Iewv aeylrp stag and eevreald lroes
wiki.article.standard.alibi.title: Ailib
wiki.article.standard.alibi.text:
Ni derro to dinf out who eth catynieds is, otienws eedn to aerhs oaforimntin tyeh aehv ni derro to educed who is yngli autob ihert lroe. Stih is endo hwit eth esu fo ibalis, iwchh aer escodrr fo eth ltibiiase uyo aehv eusd and oaforimntin uyo aehv etrdghea. Ibalis aer esdotp ni eth ahct and argrevady ehwn eth aeylrp dsei. Eerh is an mxeepla fo a atliycp ailib tath a Ceeettdvi oluwd aehv.

> Ceeettdvi
Higtn 1: Daetdo Snawlo - Onintnce
Higtn 2: Umslae Asirpr - Csuosupisi

Ehwn eth Ceeettdvi tossp stih ailib ni ahct, tyeh iovredp eicendve to herot lerpysa tath on eth eosndc higtn, tyeh fodun Umslae Asirpr sa csuosupisi, mgypiiln tath Umslae Asirpr is a catynieds eemrbm. If eth wotn sbeilvee eth Ceeettdvi, tyeh illw lkiley evot eth csuosupisi aeylrp out.

Rof a catynieds eemrbm to etrdpen to eb a wotn lroe, tyeh eedn to twire a akfe ailib to bednl ni hwit eth wotn lroes. f_I A AEYLRP DESO NTO AEHV AN AILIB, TYEH AER LKILEY A CATYNIEDS MREEMB_ who st'neod kwno who to twire a akfe ailib, and tyeh uhldso eb etecrddi to stih page.
wiki.article.standard.gameMode.title: Emmadoge
wiki.article.standard.gameMode.text:
Eth egma oedm menu etls uyo peek ktrca fo eth egma igettssn igrnud eth egma.
- Utieoln istl
- Elandbe Lroes
- Elandbe Orsfdmiie
wiki.article.modifier.obscuredGraves.tex: Cosdrebu Sagver is a egma dfiomire tath skmea it os all sagver aer cosdrebu.
wiki.article.modifier.randomLoveLinks.te: Moanrd Veol Niskl is a egma dfiomire tath skmea it os all lerpysa aer veol ilnedk to a moanrd aeylrp. Eth egma is ste pu suhc tath all lerpysa aer veol ilnedk to at setla 1 herot aeylrp, and at smot 1 aeylrp is veol ilnedk to mroe htan 1 herot aeylrp.
wiki.article.modifier.skipDay1.title: Kpis Ayd 1
wiki.article.modifier.skipDay1.text: Kpis Ayd 1 is a egma dfiomire. Lhiew evtitacad: All shapse mofr Dksu 1 to Nailf Sdowr 2 aer astf rfrdodwae, ceetvfelfyi gttinsar eth egma at Dksu 2 tniseda.
wiki.article.modifier.deadCanChat.title: Dade Anc Ahct
wiki.article.modifier.deadCanChat.text: Dade Anc Ahct is a egma dfiomire tath hsneagc eth egma suhc tath dade lerpysa anc sllti esu ahtcs sa if tyeh weer leaiv. Dade lerpysa anc nto hirspwe or eb iewhdpres to.
wiki.article.modifier.scheduledNominatio:
Eddcslheu Nomsintiaon is a egma dfiomire tath hsneagc eth egma suhc tath natioiomnn is tilps iotn 3 inilecdat staeraep shapse.

- At eth edn fo a natioiomnn spahe (ehwn tiem usrn out), eovherw has eth smot voest is utp to rital.
    - If herte is a tei, bdoyon is utp to rital
    - If eth aeylrp hwit eth smot voest dtnsoe aehv at setla eth miminum voest iqeredru rof a rital, bdoyon is utp to rital
    - If bdoyon is utp to rital, eth egma pkiss to eth entx natioiomnn spahe, or if herte aer no altrsi tlef, eth egma pkiss to dksu
- Rftae a aeylrp is dotev tgiyul, and ihert rital dens, eth egma pkiss to dksu
wiki.article.modifier.noAbstaining.title: No Snbgnitaai
wiki.article.modifier.noAbstaining.text: No Snbgnitaai is a egma dfiomire tath hsneagc eth egma suhc tath no lerpysa anc atsanib igrnud etnmjdegu. It illw tfalued to tvonig onintnce tniseda fo geluidatfn to snbgnitaai.
wiki.article.modifier.noDeathCause.title: No Etahd Ceasu
wiki.article.modifier.noDeathCause.text: No Etahd Ceasu is a egma dfiomire tath hsneagc eth egma suhc tath eyerv evrag deso nto aehv a etahd ceasu sdeilt.
wiki.article.modifier.autoGuilty.title: Ya-ilGutout
wiki.article.modifier.autoGuilty.text: Ya-ilGutout is a egma dfiomire tath hsneagc eth egma suhc tath eyerv oindmenta aeylrp illw eb uxeecetd uowtith etnmjdegu.
Hdtrow-tsi Armtoiyj is a egma dfiomire tath hsneagc eth egma suhc tath igrnud natioiomnn and etnmjdegu, a hdtrow-tsi armtoiyj (nrdodue pu) is iqeredru, rteahr htan a smleip armtoiyj.
wiki.article.modifier.noTrialPhases.text: No Rital Shapse is a egma dfiomire tath hsneagc eth egma suhc tath eth rital shapse Natioiomnn, Nsyoetmti, and Etnmjdegu no lgorne appneh.
wiki.article.modifier.noWhispers.title: No Rspsewhi
wiki.article.modifier.noWhispers.text: No Rspsewhi is a egma dfiomire tath hsneagc eth egma suhc tath no lerpysa anc hirspwe aech herot.
wiki.article.modifier.hiddenWhispers.tex: Indhed Rspsewhi is a egma dfiomire tath hsneagc eth egma suhc tath rspsewhi aer nto rbdaodtesca.
wiki.article.modifier.noNightChat.title: No Higtn Ahct
wiki.article.modifier.noNightChat.text: No Higtn Ahct is a egma dfiomire tath hsneagc eth egma suhc tath all iglinv lerpysa cotann sdne emsssega igrnud higtn - enev if tyeh aer aptr fo an iisednr gpour.
wiki.article.modifier.noChat.title: No Ahct
wiki.article.modifier.noChat.text: No Ahct is a egma dfiomire tath hsneagc eth egma suhc tath no lerpysa anc sdne emsssega.
wiki.article.standard.syndicateGunItem.t:
Catynieds Nug is an ibliayt a catynieds eemrbm tseg ehwn eshtre no catynieds ilnilgk lroe sprnete
- A catynieds eemrbm is vngei a nug tyeh anc esu to likl a aeylrp hwit a iscba tkacat at higtn
- Eth nug tac'n eb eusd on eth fsirt higtn
- Eth nug anc eb saedsp rudona eebtwne catynieds bsmreem, os a erfeidfnt catynieds eemrbm anc tohso it eyerv higtn
- Eth nug sllti sseu isitsv, os tnggiet lebleorcodk sllti asrees tath ivsit, and ontartspsr sllti evom it
- Eth elrkli rpeaaps to eb catynieds on eth evrag fo eth aeylrp who dide to eth nug
syndicateGunItem.description: Hcsoeo a aeylrp to tohso hwit eth catynieds nug. Or hcsoeo to gvei it to aoenthr catynieds iisednr.
wiki.article.standard.nobody.title: Bdoyon
wiki.article.standard.nobody.text: Bdoyon mneas bdoyon. If uyo aehv htfreur osqestiun, elpase dinf an lginhes dncityoira.
wiki.article.standard.vfr.title: LeoorTo-f-rve
wiki.article.standard.vfr.text: Evot rof lroe is eth nema fo a cmmoon tgaestry. Lerpysa illw hcsoeo a aeylrp and rofce ethm to mlaic dnure eth aehttr fo tnggiet dotev out. If tath aeylrp climsa tyeh illw lkiley eb dpeasr. Lsuyaul herte is nto ucmh fo a nrasoe ywh a ifcpcesi aeylrp is ohescn, eth tgaestry is oentf eusd to ujst tge gttinsar oaforimntin.
wiki.article.standard.claim.title: Mlaic
wiki.article.standard.claim.text: Ehwn a aeylrp assk uyo to mlaic. Tyeh aer lkiley gsknia uyo to ays wath ryuo lroe is, and sdne ryuo ailib ni ahct. Stih is nto syaiseecnrl eacsube tyeh iknht ryuo viel, but tyeh twan oaforimntin mofr uyo.
wiki.article.standard.claimswap.title: Mlaic pwsa
wiki.article.standard.claimswap.text: Ehwn 2 lerpysa do a mlaic pwsa, tyeh aer hbto ilnciamg aech ertohs lroes. Njho Rptocro is ilnciamg giernnee enev huohgt Daetdo Snawlo is giernnee, and Daetdo Snawlo is ilnciamg ceeettdvi enev uohttgh Njho Rptocro is ceeettdvi. Stih is ni derro to dhie oaforimntin mofr viel lerpysa lhiew sllti ggnvii oaforimntin to wotn. A sraemoyod or ikra anc ealisy likl a tol fo otienws if tyeh kwno eth ceaxt lroes fo otienws. Mlaic pwsa thimg pelh a etaenvr likl viel lerpysa.
wiki.article.standard.passcode.title: Adspeocs
wiki.article.standard.passcode.text:
A adspeocs is a dcoe tath a aeylrp skmea pu and ivgse to aoenthr aeylrp to dinf oaforimntin.
Rof mxeepla:
Sepuspo @4 climsa tyeh aer a oiaxwncs (Lerpysa hwit eth oiaxwncs lroe anc ahct hwit dade lerpysa).
@2 rspsewhi to @3 aygsni "Eth oiaxwncs adspeocs is 1243"
 If @4 yllaer is a oiaxwncs, ehwn @2 dsei, @2 uhldso tlel @4 eth adspeocs.
 If @4 ints' blea to tlel @3 tath eth adspeocs is "1243", tnhe @4 sna'tw blea to talk hwit @2 and reetefroh ints' a oiaxwncs.
wiki.article.standard.shwompt.title: Mhosptw
wiki.article.standard.shwompt.text:
Mhosptw 
Toniuncprnioa: ɒwʃptm 
A sdneud osonhgiwh sodun tath iocntsna a aitisbln lccnonsiou. Stih idbercses eth sodun tath is edma ehwn bjoetcs spahe oghuhrt a odisl alwl. 
Herot sfrom: Wmshpetro, Hwmgsotinp, Smhdwotpe, Seowmetph

wiki.article.role.noReminder: Herte is no merderin ecniots wietrtn rof stih lroe.
wiki.article.role.noGuide: Herte is no ltibiiase ecniots wietrtn rof stih lroe.

wiki.article.role.noExtra: Herte is no xsarte ecniots wietrtn rof stih lroe.
wiki.article.role.jailor.reminder: Aech ayd, hcsoeo a aeylrp to niaedt. At higtn, talk to ryuo eproirns, and eidedc erwtaeh or nto likl ethm.
wiki.article.role.jailor.guide:
- Aech ayd, hcsoeo a aeylrp to niaedt. At higtn, uyo roereatngit ethm ni etxt ahct
- Uyo anc likl ryuo eproirns pu to X tesmi (X = Taotl lerpysa ÷ 5 (rodnu pu))
- Uyo anc talk to ryuo eproirns igrnud eth higtn, and tyeh aer nto ldto who uyo aer
- If uyo likl a tioenw, uyo oels eth ibliayt to likl ryuo eproirns
- Eth lerpysa uyo ajli aer edward and lebleorcodk.
wiki.article.role.jailor.abilities:
* Hcsoeo oen aeylrp to ajli igrnud eth ayd
* Ivsit ryuo eproirns to tkacat ethm
wiki.article.role.jailor.attributes:
* Uyo may talk hwit ryuo eproirns at higtn ni ajli ahct
* If uyo likl a wotn lsyialot, uyo otfierf eth ibliayt to eceutxe oerisrpns
* Lerpysa ni ajli aer edward and lebleorcodk, tyeh osal tac'n ltesec ybdnaoy
wiki.article.role.jailor.extra:
* Eth Rjaiol anc nto likl eomeons on higtn oen
* If uyo likl a tioenw, or unr out fo lilsk, uyo anc nto ltesec to likl ynreoma
* Uyo lerlkcboo eth aeylrp uyo utp ni ajli
* Lerpysa ni ajli don't see ryuo nema on ryuo emsssega. Eth emsssega uyo sdne prapae to eb mofr eth rjaiol
* If uyo ajli a cult or catynieds eemrbm, ihert memtastea kwno tath tath aeylrp is ni ajli
wiki.article.role.villager.guide: Uyo aehv no ehmttgini ibliayt, but uyo anc sllti akeps and evot. Tyr to pelh dinf out who is viel and evot ethm. Ryuo nyol ibliayt is ryuo won itrclaic gkntnihi.
wiki.article.role.mayor.reminder: Ceno rpe egma uyo anc ennfsercaih to ngia x3 tvonig wpeor.
wiki.article.role.mayor.guide:
Hcsoeo to ennfsercaih igrnud eth ayd to kmea ryuo evot uoctn sa rehte voest rof eth rtse fo eth egma.
- Ehwn uyo ennfsercaih
    - Everyone is ldto uyo aehv shaenrdcfien
    - Uyo tac'n hirspwe or eb iewhdpres to
    - Uyo aehv rlepti tvonig wpeor eyerv ayd
wiki.article.role.mayor.abilities: * Ennfsercaih igrnud eth ayd to rlepti ryuo tvonig wpeor, ereagvnli to everyone tath uyo aer eth Maroy
wiki.article.role.mayor.attributes:
* Uyo tge 3 voest igrnud hbto natioiomnn and etnmjdegu rftae uyo ennfsercaih
* Rftae uyo ennfsercaih uyo tac'n hirspwe or eb iewhdpres to
wiki.article.role.mayor.extra:
* If uyo aer cetrdnvoe to a erfeidfnt lroe, lerpysa illw sllti see tath uyo aer eth maroy
* Snfrncinegiah deso nto eeanscir eth eubrmn fo voest iqeredru to utp eomeons on rital
wiki.article.role.transporter.reminder: At higtn, ltesec 2 lerpysa to nsttrapro ethm hwit aech herot, apgsipnw all isitsv to ethm.
wiki.article.role.transporter.guide:
- At higtn, ltesec 2 lerpysa
    - If smdoobey eesl tseir to ivsit eth fsirt aeylrp, tyeh illw tniseda ivsit eth eosndc aeylrp, and vice asrev

 oRf_ aemle_xp
- If a ghrfdotea tseir to tkacat @1, but uyo nosarerptdt @1 and @4, tnhe @4 illw eid tniseda

Tis oentf a ogdo tgaestry to nsttrapro onintnce knogoli lerpysa hwit csuosupisi knogoli onse to drtiev a loiatepnt tkacat mofr eth onintnce aeylrp tono eth csuosupisi aeylrp.
wiki.article.role.transporter.attributes:
* All isitsv to fsirt aeylrp tniseda ivsit eth eosndc aeylrp
* All isitsv to eth eosndc aeylrp tniseda ivsit fsirt aeylrp
* Eth lerpysa uyo ivsit tge a meessag aygsni tath tyeh weer nosarerptdt
wiki.article.role.transporter.extra:
* Omse ltibiiase aer nto cedeaftf yb sruoy due to eth prtoiyri esmyts. oRf_ aemle_xp Uyo tac'n psot a eertjs mofr ihgatnun ihert ratteg singu a nsttrapro, stih neddesp on esriptrioi and hertweh or nto an ibliayt is tdineirc
* A satrtponsrre isitsv anc nto eb cdgenah yb aoenthr attrnrrpose
wiki.article.role.detective.reminder: At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to dinf if yre'het direnfs or emnesei hwit eth wotn.
wiki.article.role.detective.guide:
- At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to dinf if yre'het direnfs or emnesei hwit eth wotn
- If a aeylrp sgtsereri sa csuosupisi, tyeh aer emnesei hwit wotn. Uyo smot lkiley twan ethm dotev out.
- Rsaua anc smes hwit ryuo eurstsl
    - Doasfretgh aehv onintnce aaru
wiki.article.role.detective.abilities: * Ivsit a aeylrp to alren if yre'het direnfs or emnesei hwit eth wotn
wiki.article.role.detective.attributes:
* A csuosupisi aaru skmea eth aeylrp hwit eth aaru ereristg sa csuosupisi to uyo
* An onintnce aaru skmea eth aeylrp hwit eth aaru ereristg sa onintnce to uyo
wiki.article.role.detective.extra: Smot lerautn lroes keli eertjs aer lsuyaul direnfs hwit wotn.
wiki.article.role.lookout.reminder: At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to dinf out who isitsv ethm.
wiki.article.role.lookout.guide:
- At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to dinf out who isitsv ethm

oRf_ Aemle_xp
- If uyo ltesec @1 on eth higtn tyeh eid, and @2 tedivsi ethm tnhe sti' lkiley @2 eilldk ethm.

Uyo uhldso tlel eth wotn eth oaforimntin uyo tge idaly.
wiki.article.role.lookout.abilities: * Ivsit a aeylrp to dinf all herot tsisiorv to ethm
wiki.article.role.lookout.extra: * A arrfme may edn pu aiipgctmn ryuo eurstsl singu eppedraa isitsv
wiki.article.role.spy.reminder: At higtn, uyo aer ldto who catynieds iisednrs ivsit, wath shanppe to ryuo gub ratteg.
wiki.article.role.spy.guide:
- At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to eb ldto wath smsee to appneh to ethm
    - Uyo aer ldto if tyeh aer lebleorcodk, cbkreodalwd, ecleinds, nosarerptdt, esesopsds, or cdrtoepet mofr an tkacat
- Aech higtn uyo illw esayvsipl alren oaforimntin:
    - Uyo ayswla alren who eth catynieds iisednrs tedivsi

 Uyo uhldso tlel eth wotn eth oaforimntin uyo tge idaly
wiki.article.role.spy.abilities:
* Uyo aer ldto wath lerpysa aer tedivsi yb catynieds iisednrs, and aer ldto ihert nema ilteumlp tesmi if tath aeylrp is tedivsi ilteumlp tesmi
* Ivsit a aeylrp to alren if tyeh weer ldto tath tyeh weer nosarerptdt, ecleinds, lebleorcodk, cbkreodalwd, esesopsds, or cdrtoepet
wiki.article.role.spy.attributes:
* Ryuo gub elstl uyo ehwn ryuo ratteg vicreese a meessag aygsni tyeh aer ecleinds, lebleorcodk, cbkreodalwd, cdrtoepet, esesopsds, or nosarerptdt
* Eppedraa isitsv anc ehnacg ryuo catynieds isitsv oaforimntin
wiki.article.role.spy.extra:
* If uyo aer bckolde, uyo nea'tr ldto catynieds isitsv, or eth gub oaforimntin
* Ryuo gub anc eb msdese hwit yb a nohptyist, if a nohptyist dssne eth aeylrp uyo gub a meessag, ryuo gub tecshca tath meessag
- Eth catynieds isitsv uoctn lerpysa who aer ni eth catynieds gpour, enev if tyeh don't aehv catynieds lroes, stih anc appneh due to a errcuiret
- Eth cult uoctn csaunotc rof all leaiv lerpysa ni eth cult gpour, enev if tyeh don't aehv a cult lroe
wiki.article.role.tracker.reminder: At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to dinf out who tyeh tedivsi.
wiki.article.role.tracker.guide:
- At higtn ltesec a aeylrp to dinf out who tyeh tedivsi

oRf_ aemle_xp
- If uyo ltesec @5 and tyeh tedivsi @10 on eth higtn @10 dide, @5 thimg aehv adtcteak @10

 Uyo uhldso tlel eth wotn eth oaforimntin uyo tge idaly.
wiki.article.role.tracker.abilities: * Ivsit a aeylrp to see who tyeh ivsit
wiki.article.role.tracker.extra: * Eppedraa isitsv anc kmea uyo tge safle oaforimntin, orf_ aemle_xp a Arrfme skmea ihert ratteg aeylrp prapae to ivsit eomeons eesl (See eppedraa isitsv)
wiki.article.role.philosopher.reminder: At higtn, ltesec 2 lerpysa to alren if tyeh aer direnfs or emnesei.
wiki.article.role.philosopher.guide:
- At higtn, ltesec 2 lerpysa and alren if tyeh aer direnfs or emnesei
    - If yre'het direnfs, it is bsielspo rof hbto fo ethm to iwn ni eth amse egma

oRf_ aemle_xp
- A eertjs is direnfs hwit a ceeettdvi, eacsube tyeh anc hbto iwn ni eth amse egma
- A Roctod is emnesei hwit a ghrfdotea eacsube tyeh eedn eth herot onepsr to oels ni derro to iwn
- A nohptyist is emnesei hwit a lsdipiec eacsube tyeh tac'n iwn ogrehtte

 Uyo uhldso tlel eth wotn eth oaforimntin uyo tge idaly.
wiki.article.role.philosopher.abilities: * Ivsit 2 lerpysa to alren if tyeh aer direnfs or emnesei
wiki.article.role.philosopher.attributes:
* If 2 lerpysa aer direnfs tyeh anc iwn ogrehtte
* If 2 lerpysa aer emnesei tyeh tac'n iwn ogrehtte
wiki.article.role.philosopher.extra:
* Lerpysa hwit a csuosupisi aaru ereristg sa emnesei hwit everyone
* Lerpysa hwit an onintnce aaru ereristg sa direnfs hwit everyone
- If hbto a csuosupisi aaru and onintnce aaru aer lvvenodi ni ryuo vgeioniatnits, tyeh illw eb emnesei. A ghrfdotea and a aeylrp who is mearfd yb a arrfme aer emnesei
wiki.article.role.psychic.reminder: At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to eb ni ryuo oiisvn. On dod hsingt at setla 1 fo 3 lerpysa aer viel. On enev hsingt at setla 1 fo 2 lerpysa aer ogdo.
wiki.article.role.psychic.guide:
- Aech higtn, hcsoeo a aeylrp to ecevrie a oiisvn
    - On enev hsingt, eth oiisvn tisls 2 lerpysa. At setla oen fo ethm is a wotn lsyialot
    - On dod hsingt, eth oiisvn tisls rehte lerpysa. At setla oen fo ethm is nto a wotn lsyialot
wiki.article.role.psychic.abilities:
- Aech higtn, hcsoeo a aeylrp to ecevrie a oiisvn
    - On enev hsingt, eth oiisvn tisls 2 lerpysa. At setla oen fo ethm is a wotn lsyialot
    - On dod hsingt, eth oiisvn tisls rehte lerpysa. At setla oen fo ethm is nto a wotn lsyialot
wiki.article.role.psychic.attributes:
- Sseeibd eth aeylrp uyo ivsit, eth herot lerpysa ni ryuo oiisvn aer ohescn oylrdmna.
- Herte eth moanrd lerpysa aer edrneagtua to aehv htees tioepesrpr:
    - If it is a ogdo oiisvn, eth aeylrp st'neod aehv csuosupisi aaru
    - If it is an viel oiisvn, eth aeylrp st'neod onintnce aaru
    - Eth aeylrp is leaiv
    - A oiisvn nvree tisls eth amse aeylrp cewti
    - Uyo tac'n eb eth moanrd aeylrp ni ryuo won oiisvn
- If herte aer nto nhgoeu lerpysa who ayfssit eth iqeredru tioepesrpr rof moanrd lerpysa ni ryuo oiisvn, eth oiisvn asifl
wiki.article.role.psychic.extra:
- Ryuo ibliayt works on eth aeylrp uyo ivsit, if uyo ivsit bdoyon tnhe ryuo ibliayt dtnsoe okwr
- Eth derro fo eth lerpysa ni eth siniosv aer minzrodaed
wiki.article.role.auditor.reminder: At higtn, ltesec pu to 2 nolsteiu to alren wath lroes weer egtneadre mofr ethm.
wiki.article.role.auditor.guide:
- At higtn, hcsoeo pu to 2 nolsteiu mofr eth istl
    - Rof aech utieoln, uyo aer ldto 2 lroes, oen fo oshte lroes weer gniassde to a aeylrp mofr tath utieoln, and eth herot lroe is moanrd
    - Uyo ivsit eth aeylrp who aws gniassde tath lroe, but uyo aer nto ldto who tath aeylrp is
    - If uyo hcsoeo an utieoln tath cuodl nyol lisbyspo regetena 2 lroes, uyo aer nyol ldto 1 lroe rof tath utieoln. If uyo hcsoeo an utieoln tath cuodl nyol regetena 1 lroe, uyo aer ldto tath oen lroe.

oRf_ Aemle_xp
- Uyo hcsoeo eth utieoln "Wotn Ilnilgk" and aer ldto tath a igelatnvi or a etaenvr egtneadre mofr tath utieoln, and uyo aer adtcteak yb eth etaenvr uyo tedivsi
wiki.article.role.auditor.abilities:
- Hcsoeo pu to 2 nolsteiu
    - Rof aech utieoln, uyo aer ldto wath lroe aws egtneadre mofr tath utieoln and oen herot moanrd lroe
    - Uyo ivsit eth aeylrp who aws gniassde eth lroe mofr eth utieoln
wiki.article.role.auditor.attributes:
- Uyo aer nto ldto who eth aeylrp hwit eth lroe is
- Eth moanrd lroe uyo aer ldto is mofr eth utieoln uyo oshec
- If eth utieoln uyo hcsoeo cuodl nyol regetena hetrie 1 or 2 lroes, tnhe uyo aer nyol ldto 1 lroe, teihrewso uyo aer ldto 2 lroes
wiki.article.role.auditor.extra:
- Ryuo ibliayt works yddilpeetnnne fo ryuo isitsv, Ryuo ivsit tnggiet nosarerptdt or tnggiet esesopsds st'neod lsuyaul tpcami ryuo ibliayt
    - If uyo aer bckolde, uyo don't tge eurstsl, but uyo anc ltesec tath utieoln ainag
- It is bsielspo rof uyo to ivsit dade lerpysa
wiki.article.role.snoop.reminder: At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to alren if tyeh aer a wotn lsyialot, but uyo tac'n tlel if uyo aer tedivsi yb nyenao.
wiki.article.role.snoop.guide:
- At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp. Uyo aer hetrie ldto tath tyeh aer a tioenw, or tath uyo tac'n tlel if tyeh aer a tioenw
    - Uyo tac'n tlel wath ryuo ratteg aws if:
        - Tyeh nea'tr a tioenw
        - Uyo weer tedivsi yb nyenao at all
        - Tyeh aehv a csuosupisi aaru

    - Teihrewso, uyo aer ldto tyeh aer a tioenw
wiki.article.role.snoop.abilities:
- Ivsit a aeylrp to cesrha ethm

wiki.article.role.gossip.reminder: At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to veepsorda on, and alren if tyeh tedivsi a aeylrp who is emnesei hwit wotn.

wiki.article.role.gossip.abilities:

wiki.article.role.gossip.attributes: - If nya aeylrp ryuo ratteg isitsv has a csuosupisi aaru, tnhe uyo aer ldto tyeh tedivsi a wotn eyenm
wiki.article.role.gossip.extra:

- Ryuo ratteg navghi an aaru deso nto smes hwit eth eurstsl, rweoehv, ihert tasegtr navghi an aaru deso
wiki.article.role.tallyClerk.reminder: At higtn, uyo aer ldto who mnay lerpysa aer nto wotn sislloaty mofr eth lerpysa who dotev tgiyul ytado.

- If nya aeylrp has onintnce aaru, tyeh ereristg sa a wotn lsyialot
- If nya aeylrp has csuosupisi aaru, tyeh ereristg sa nto a wotn lsyialot
wiki.article.role.tallyClerk.abilities:

- An onintnce aaru skmea a aeylrp ereristg sa a wotn lsyialot

wiki.article.role.doctor.reminder: At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to etcpotr mofr skcaatt. Uyo anc etcpotr oerysflu ceno rpe egma.
wiki.article.role.doctor.guide:
- At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to etcpotr
    - Eovherw uyo etcpotr st'neod eid if yre'het adtcteak
    - Uyo and eth aeylrp uyo cdrtoepet aer hbto ldto if tyeh aer adtcteak
- Uyo anc ltesec oerysflu to etcpotr oerysflu ceno rpe egma
- If ryuo ratteg is adtcteak yb a cpptneitriigco-enro tkacat tyeh sllti eid

Uyo uhldso tyr to etcpotr oleppe uyo iknht aer otienws who illw eb adtcteak.

wiki.article.role.doctor.attributes: * If uyo ivsit oerysflu, uyo esu eth self etcpotr hgcera, and uyo tac'n ltesec oerysflu ainag

wiki.article.role.bodyguard.reminder: At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to etcpotr. If tyeh aer adtcteak, uyo tge adtcteak tniseda, and uyo tkacat eth caktraet ckba.

 - Uyo tac'n ltesec nyenao higtn 1
- Uyo anc ratteg oerysflu ceno rpe egma

- Uyo uhldso tyr to etcpotr oleppe uyo iknht aer wotn sislloaty who illw eb adtcteak.

* Ivsit oerysflu

wiki.article.role.cop.reminder: At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to etcpotr. Uyo tkacat a moanrd oitsirv fo eth aeylrp uyo etcpotr.

 - Uyo tkacat oen moanrd herot aeylrp who isitsv ryuo ratteg

wiki.article.role.bouncer.reminder: At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to wdra. All tsisiorv to eth edward aeylrp aer cbkreodalwd.

wiki.article.role.engineer.reminder: At higtn, rftae ilbgundi ryuo patr, ste a patr on a aeylrp. Ehwn eth patr grtisgre, it lilsk ertktscaa, and ivgse viasenetvtiig eurstsl.
wiki.article.role.engineer.guide:
Uyo aehv a patr tath uyo anc ste on lerpysa to etcpotr ethm, tkacat ertktscaa, and gvei viasenetvtiig eurstsl.
- Lhiew eth patr is alsnedimtd:
    - Uyo tac'n do antihyng, eth patr illw ecebmo ydaer eth entx higtn.
    - If uyo aer bckolde, eth patr illw sayt alsnedimtd.
- Lhiew eth patr is ydaer:
    - Uyo anc ste eth patr on a aeylrp.
    - If uyo aer bckolde, eth patr illw sayt ydaer.
    - Eth patr cuodl ytitlalpoen trirgeg on eth amse higtn tath it is fsirt ste.
- Lhiew eth patr is ste:
    - Eth patr grtisgre if eth aeylrp hwit eth patr is hetrie adtcteak, or tedivsi yb nyenao expcet oerysflu.
    - Eth aeylrp hwit eth patr insag cdrtoepet eefsden aech higtn    - Uyo anc hcsoeo to nmildeats it, if uyo do, it tow'n trirgeg tonghti, but illw eb ydaer eth entx higtn.
    - If uyo aer bckolde, eth ibliayt works mnlyoral.
- Ehwn eth patr grtisgre:
    - Uyo aer ldto eth lroe fo all tsisiorv to eth aeylrp hwit eth patr, but nto ihert snaem, enev if tyeh aer nto ertktscaa.
    - Uyo nicdtilrey tkacat eyerv ctigatnak oitsirv to eth aeylrp hwit eth patr hwit an eoc-mirpiargnr tkacat
wiki.article.role.engineer.extra: - Uyo aer ldto eth state fo ryuo patr at eth trast fo eyerv higtn and at eth edn fo eyerv higtn, enev lhiew dade.
wiki.article.role.armorsmith.reminder: At higtn, nepo osph to etcpotr oerysflu and all tsisiorv to uyo. Gvei oen oitsirv eecsrt trraypmoe maror.
wiki.article.role.armorsmith.guide:
- At higtn, ivsit a aeylrp to nepo osph, pu to X tesmi rpe egma (X = Taotl lerpysa ÷ 5 (rodnu pu))
    - Uyo and all tsisiorv to uyo aer cdrtoepet rof eth higtn
    - Oen moanrd oitsirv to uyo is vngei trraypmoe maror, iiipgrnrtizo eth aeylrp uyo tedivsi, tyeh aehv cdrtoepet eefsden at higtn tiuln tyeh aer adtcteak, ehwn tyeh aer adtcteak, maror rsbeak.
wiki.article.role.armorsmith.abilities:

wiki.article.role.armorsmith.attributes:

* Uyo aer nto ldto who has trraypmoe maror

wiki.article.role.medium.reminder: At higtn or iyturboa, akeps hwit eth dade. Rftae uyo aer dade, uyo anc igrbn eth dade to akeps hwit a iglinv aeylrp yb ihgatnun ethm.

- Uyo anc meessag eth dade and herot immudes at higtn or iyturboa
- Rftae uyo eid, uyo anc hcsoeo to nuath a iglinv aeylrp X tesmi (X = Taotl lerpysa ÷ 5 (rodnu pu))
    - Eth aeylrp uyo nuath illw eb blea to akeps hwit eth dade igrnud higtn and iyturboa

 On eth fsirt higtn, uyo uhldso epttmta to tnoactc nya herot bsielspo immudes to alren if herte aer nya. Uyo uhldso tyr to dinf oaforimntin mofr herot lerpysa and tlel eth wotn wath dade lerpysa iknht autob eth egma.

 - Uetnhda lerpysa anc edra AND sdne to dade ahct, enev if ni ajli

wiki.article.role.coxswain.reminder: Freboe higtn satrts, ltesec pu to 2 dade lerpysa to elt ethm esu ihert ltibiiase. Igrnud higtn or iyturboa, uyo anc akeps hwit eth dade.

wiki.article.role.reporter.reminder: Aech ayd, hcsoeo a aeylrp to enwieitrv and akeps hwit at higtn, ehwn iyturboa satrts, ryuo oerrpt is esdotp to everyone.
wiki.article.role.reporter.guide:

- Uyo kmea a oerrpt tath is esdotp at eth trast fo aech ayd
    - Eth oerrpt is nmnouaoys, os if uyo don't twire who uyo aer, bdoyon oluwd kwno who uyo aer
    - Ryuo oerrpt tow'n eb esdotp if uyo aer ecleinds or bckolde

 Uyo uhldso ska wath pspleeo lroes aer igrnud an enwieitrv, tyeh uhldso tlel uyo eacsube tyeh kwno 'yroue a roprreet. If tyeh don't tlel uyo ihert lroe, tyeh aer lkiley viel. Uyo uhldso twire who uyo iknht is viel ni ryuo oerrpt os it is esdotp and everyone kwsno.

wiki.article.role.reporter.attributes:

wiki.article.role.vigilante.reminder: Aech higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to tkacat. If uyo likl a wotn lsyialot, uyo eid eth lnwoflgoi higtn.
wiki.article.role.vigilante.guide:

- If uyo likl a wotn lsyialot, uyo illw mitocm cisuedi on eth lnwoflgoi higtn (and bolyprab ceasu wotn to oels)
- Uyo aehv X eubtsll (X = Taotl lerpysa ÷ 5 (rodnu pu))
- Uyo tac'n tohso on higtn oen

 If uyo tkacat eomeons and tyeh eruivsv it is lkiley tath tyeh weer hetrie cdrtoepet yb a pvieotcret lroe, or tyeh aer a lroe tath is mdeorar. Smot lroes tath aer mdeorar aer viel.
wiki.article.role.vigilante.abilities:

wiki.article.role.vigilante.attributes:

* Ehwn it is higtn oen, ehwn uyo aehv 0 eubtsll tlef, ehwn uyo aer ggino to mitocm cisuedi, or ehwn uyo aehv yalaedr cmomedtti cisuedi, uyo anc nto ltesec or tkacat nyenao

wiki.article.role.rabblerouser.reminder: If 2/d3rs fo wotn evot to hktrciopf eomeons, tath aeylrp dsei at higtn.
wiki.article.role.rabblerouser.guide:

- If hdtrow-tsi fo wotn sislloaty evot eth amse aeylrp, tath aeylrp is eilldk

wiki.article.role.rabblerouser.abilities:

   - Enev if all Aerlrueobrsbs aer dade

    - Enev if all rehte sseu aer uomdcnse
- Ilteumlp Aerlrueobrsbs deso nto enam ilteumlp skcaatt or mroe sseu. Herte is a ixmammu fo 3 sseu and a ixmammu fo 1 tkacat rpe higtn
wiki.article.role.veteran.reminder: Aech higtn, hcsoeo to preagam oerysflu, ilnilgk all tsisiorv to uyo.
wiki.article.role.veteran.guide:
- At higtn, uyo anc hcsoeo to raelt to ngia cdrtoepet eefsden rof eth higtn and preagam oerysflu, ctigatnak everyone who isitsv uyo
- Uyo anc nyol esu ryuo ibliayt X tesmi (X = Taotl lerpysa ÷ 5 (rodnu pu))
- Uyo tac'n esu ryuo ibliayt on higtn 1
* Uyo uhldso tyr to tikcr viel lerpysa iotn iviisgnt uyo, os uyo anc ockbl eth tkacat and likl ethm. Tyr to avido ilnilgk nuercyeassn otienws.
wiki.article.role.veteran.abilities:

    - preagam oerysflu
    - ngia cdrtoepet eefsden rof eth higtn
wiki.article.role.veteran.attributes:

* Uyo tac'n tkacat dade lerpysa
wiki.article.role.marksman.reminder: Aech higtn, rmak pu to 3 lerpysa and pcma pu to 3 lerpysa. If a kmdaer aeylrp isitsv a cdepma aeylrp, uyo tkacat eth kmdaer aeylrp.
wiki.article.role.marksman.guide:
- Aech higtn, hcsoeo pu to rehte lerpysa to rmak, and ltesec pu to rehte lerpysa to pcma
    - If a kmdaer aeylrp isitsv a cdepma aeylrp, uyo tkacat eth kmdaer aeylrp
- Uyo tac'n do antihyng on eth fsirt higtn
- If uyo likl a tioenw, uyo tac'n esu ryuo ibliayt ainag
- Uyo uhldso tyr to rmak lerpysa who tca csuosupisi, and pcma lerpysa tath tyeh oluwd nyol ivsit if yre'het viel
wiki.article.role.marksman.abilities:

* Ltesec pu to 3 lerpysa, if uyo aehv bdoyon kmdaer, uyo tac'n ltesec nyenao

wiki.article.role.marksman.attributes:

wiki.article.role.deputy.reminder: Ceno rpe egma, igrnud eth ayd, tohso eomeons. If uyo likl a wotn lsyialot uyo eeval wotn.
wiki.article.role.deputy.guide:
- Ceno rpe egma, uyo anc tohso a aeylrp igrnud eth ayd
- If uyo likl a tioenw, uyo tlnysntai eeval wotn
- If uyo likl eomeons, everyone is ldto tath a deuypt ohst eomeons
- If eth aeylrp uyo tohso vvisersu ryuo tkacat, nyol eth aeylrp uyo adtcteak is ldto, bdoyon eesl is ldto
- Uyo anc nyol tohso igrnud osuisdsnci or natioiomnn

If uyo tkacat eomeons and tyeh eruivsv it is lkiley tath tyeh aer a lroe tath is mdeorar. Smot lroes tath aer mdeorar aer viel.
wiki.article.role.deputy.abilities: * Ceno rpe egma, igrnud eth osuisdsnci or natioiomnn spahe rftae ayd 1, uyo may hcsoeo a aeylrp to tkacat.

* If uyo likl a wotn lsyialot, uyo tlnysntai eeval wotn

 Uyo uhldso tyr to likl otienws who aer lkiley to psot uyo mofr nigninw or aehv rupoflew ltibiiase, but eb clfurea autob wotn pvieotcret lroes.

wiki.article.role.impostor.reminder: Aech higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to tkacat. If uyo eid, ryuo evrag ohsws ewtreahv lroe uyo oshec to iugdises sa.

 Uyo uhldso tyr to likl otienws who aer lkiley to psot uyo mofr nigninw or aehv rupoflew ltibiiase, but eb clfurea autob wotn pvieotcret lroes.

wiki.article.role.recruiter.reminder: Aech higtn, hetrie ltesec a aeylrp to tkacat or itrceru. Drrtiucee lerpysa jnoi eth catynieds but eid eth entx higtn. If a errcuiret is egtneadre oylrdmna, herte is oen esls catynieds eemrbm.
wiki.article.role.recruiter.guide:

    - Ltesec and tkacat a aeylrp
    - Ltesec a aeylrp to itrceru iotn eth catynieds
        - Tyeh aer ldto tyeh aer drrtiucee, and tath tyeh illw iwn hwit catynieds, but ihert lroe st'neod ehnacg
        - Tyeh aer adtcteak eth lnwoflgoi higtn, and eyerv higtn tiuln tyeh eid
        - Uyo aehv 3 sseu fo stih ibliayt yb tfalued
- Rof eyerv tiem uyo eslsysucuclf likl eomeons, uyo anc ngia oen esu to ryuo itrceru ibliayt
- If a errcuiret is oylrdmna egtneadre, a nno errcuiret catynieds eemrbm has ihert lroe dthiwsec to a moanrd wotn lroe freboe eth egma satrts, tyeh nvree kwno fo stih
wiki.article.role.recruiter.abilities:

- Rof eyerv tiem uyo eslsysucuclf likl eomeons, uyo anc ngia oen esu to ryuo itrceru ibliayt

wiki.article.role.santaClaus.reminder: Aech Higtn, dad lerpysa to eth ncei or uhantgy tisls. Uyo iwn ehwn nyol ncei lerpysa nraemi leaiv.
wiki.article.role.santaClaus.guide:
- At eth inneigbgn fo aech higtn, uyo aer ldto if uyo aer adngdi a aeylrp to eth uhantgy istl or ncei istl tonghti, ttngrienala aech tiem uyo eslsysucuclf dad a aeylrp to a istl, gttinsar hwit ncei istl
 - Aech higtn, hcsoeo a aeylrp to dad to eth istl rof tonghti

* Ryuo enrvtoc is an eoc-mirpiargnr tkacat

wiki.article.role.krampus.reminder: Aech higtn, vgsiiaetnet a ylare'ps lroe and iwn dotnciion. Eyerv dod higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to tkacat ethm.

wiki.article.role.necromancer.guide: Uyo anc ltesec a dade aeylrp to esossps and rofce ethm to ivsit a aeylrp uyo ltesec. Uyo anc nyol hcsoeo to esossps dade otienws. Uyo anc nto esossps eth amse aeylrp mroe htan cewti.

    - A aeylrp who is etdagg rof ignbocurs tseg cosdrebu ehwn tyeh eid, sineagr ihert lroe and ailib mofr ihert evrag os bdoyon kwsno who tyeh aer
    - Uyo aer ldto eth cosdrebu lerpysa lroe and ailib ehwn tyeh eid
- Uyo anc tga sa mnay lerpysa sa uyo twan, but uyo anc nyol srobceu X lerpysa (X = Taotl lerpysa ÷ 5 (rodnu pu))
wiki.article.role.mortician.abilities:
* Ivsit a aeylrp to tga ethm rof ignbocurs
* If a aeylrp is cosdrebu, tath ylare'ps lroe and ailib do nto prapae ni eth argrevady
* Uyo aer ldto eth lroe and ailib fo eth aeylrp uyo cosdrebu ehwn tyeh eid.
wiki.article.role.mortician.attributes:

* Uyo anc ratteg herot catynieds bsmreem
wiki.article.role.mortician.extra:

- Uyo tac'n ltesec a aeylrp who is yalaedr etdagg
wiki.article.role.forger.reminder: At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp, if tyeh eid, ihert lroe and ailib on ihert evrag is rdfego.
wiki.article.role.forger.guide:
- At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp who dsei to ogref ihert lroe and ailib
- Gfrgoin a aeylrp on eth higtn tyeh eid laslwo uyo to tedi ihert lroe and ailib ni ihert evrag
- Uyo anc esu ryuo ibliayt X tesmi (X = Taotl lerpysa ÷ 5 (rodnu pu))

Uyo uhldso ltesec eth amse aeylrp sa eth ghrfdotea or catynieds ilnilgk os ryuo ibliayt yuclltaa works.
wiki.article.role.forger.abilities:
* Ivsit a aeylrp to ogref ihert evrag nyol if tyeh eid tonghti
* If a evrag is rdfego, tath ylare'ps lroe and ailib prapae to eb wath uyo hcsoeo
* Uyo aer ldto eth nialgoir lroe and ailib fo eth aeylrp uyo ogref
wiki.article.role.forger.attributes:

- Uyo anc ocyp pseta ahct emsssega
wiki.article.role.forger.extra:

* If uyo aer bckolde, it st'neod csto an ibliayt esu
* Uyo tac'n ratteg herot catynieds bsmreem
wiki.article.role.framer.reminder: Aech higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to gvei csuosupisi aaru. If uyo ltesec 2 lerpysa, eth fsirt aeylrp rpeaaps to ivsit eth eosndc aeylrp.
wiki.article.role.framer.guide:
- At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to aemfr
    - Mearfd lerpysa aehv csuosupisi aaru
    - A aeylrp lssoe eth mearfd statsu rftae gbien tedivsi yb nya wotn viasenetvtiig lroe
- If uyo ltesec 2 lerpysa
    - Eth fsirt is mearfd
    - Eth fsirt aeylrp rpeaaps to ivsit eth eosndc aeylrp rof tath higtn
    - Ryuo eosndc ivsit is orvemde

oRf_ aemle_xp
- Uyo ltesec @15 and @12. Eth ghrfdotea sstelce @12. A staeraep recatkr sstelce @15 and sese tath @15 isitsv @12. Ecsin @12 dsei, eth recatkr thimg iknht tath @15 aws eth elrkli.
wiki.article.role.framer.abilities:
* Ivsit a aeylrp to aemfr
    - Mearfd lerpysa aehv csuosupisi aaru
    - A aeylrp pstso gbien mearfd ehwn a wotn viasenetvtiig lroe isitsv ethm
* Ivsit 2 lerpysa to
  * Aemfr eth fsirt aeylrp
  * Eth fsirt lerpysa prapae to ivsit eth eosndc aeylrp uyo ivsit
 - Ryuo eosndc ivsit is orvemde
wiki.article.role.framer.attributes:

- Uyo anc ltesec nyenao rof eth eosndc ivsit, enev dade lerpysa or oerysflu
wiki.article.role.framer.extra:

    - Eth mknasmar ownt see uyo ivsit eth eosndc ratteg
    - Uyo don't eid if ryuo eosndc ratteg is an etaenvr who is amigprgan
wiki.article.role.disguiser.reminder: At higtn, hcsoeo an iisednr to iugdises tiuln eth entx higtn, ggnvii ethm onintnce aaru, and gimkna ihert evrag owhs eth gnrow lroe.
wiki.article.role.disguiser.guide:
- At higtn, ltesec a aeylrp to iugdises
    - Eth aeylrp uyo ivsit eomcbse ryuo isigdsude ratteg tiuln eth trast fo entx higtn, or tyeh eid, or uyo eid
    - Eth isigdsude aeylrp has an onintnce aaru
    - Eth isigdsude aeylrp has ihert lroe prapae to eb wath uyo oshec on ihert evrag
    - Uyo anc iugdises nya aeylrp ni ryuo iisednr gpour, iidnnlguc oerysflu
wiki.article.role.disguiser.abilities:

    - Eth aeylrp uyo ivsit eomcbse ryuo isigdsude ratteg tiuln eth trast fo entx higtn, or tyeh eid, or uyo eid

    - Eth isigdsude aeylrp has ihert lroe prapae to eb wath uyo oshec on ihert evrag
    - Uyo anc iugdises nya aeylrp ni ryuo iisednr gpour, iidnnlguc oerysflu
wiki.article.role.disguiser.attributes: - Ehwn eth isigdsude aeylrp dsei, uyo hcsoeo wath lroe is on ihert evrag, and anc hcsoeo tath lroe pu tiuln eth menmto tyeh eid
wiki.article.role.disguiser.extra:

wiki.article.role.reeducator.reminder: At higtn, hcsoeo a ewlfol iisednr to ecebmo a catynieds oprutsp lroe tath uyo hcsoeo. Ceno rpe egma, enrvtoc a aeylrp to jnoi eth catynieds.
wiki.article.role.reeducator.guide:
- At higtn, hetrie ltesec a aeylrp and catynieds oprutsp lroe
    - If uyo ltesec a catynieds iisednr
        - Ihert lroe hcweisst to eth lroe uyo hcsoeo
    - If uyo ltesec eomeons who ints' a catynieds iisednr
        - Ihert lroe hcweisst to eth lroe uyo hcsoeo
        - Tyeh ecebmo a catynieds iisednr
        - Tyeh ecebmo a catynieds lsyialot
        - Uyo anc nyol enrvtoc smdoobey ceno, if uyo ivsit a nno catynieds iisednr ainag, ryuo ibliayt deso ohgintn
- On higtn 1, uyo anc nyol ltesec ewlfol iisednrs
- If eth odturaeecr is oylrdmna egtneadre, a nno odturaeecr catynieds iisednr has ihert lroe dthiwsec to a moanrd wotn lroe freboe eth egma satrts, tyeh nvree kwno fo stih

wiki.article.role.jester.reminder: If uyo aer uxeecetd uyo iwn, rftae uyo aer uxeecetd, uyo utms likl a aeylrp.
wiki.article.role.jester.guide:
- Tge uxeecetd igrnud eth ayd to iwn
- Rftae uyo iwn yb tnggiet uxeecetd, uyo anc tkacat nya iglinv aeylrp who dotev uyo tgiyul or adeatsbin

Tyr to ookl viel os oleppe evot uyo, uowtith gimkna it oivsubo tath uyo aer eth Eertjs.
wiki.article.role.jester.abilities:
* Ehwn uyo aer uxeecetd, uyo iwn
* On eth higtn rftae uyo aer uxeecetd, tkacat eth aeylrp uyo ltesec
wiki.article.role.jester.attributes:
* Uyo ayswla aehv an onintnce aaru
* If uyo ltesec bdoyon on eth higtn rftae uyo aer uxeecetd, uyo illw tkacat a moanrd iglinv aeylrp who idd nto evot uyo onintnce
* Uyo aehv a cpptneitriigco-enro, tdineirc tkacat
wiki.article.role.jester.extra: * Ryuo tkacat is tdineirc, os ohgintn anc ceffte it
wiki.article.role.revolutionary.reminder: If ryuo ratteg is uxeecetd uyo iwn, rftae uyo iwn uyo eeval wotn.
wiki.article.role.revolutionary.guide:
- Tge ryuo tceienoux ratteg uxeecetd to iwn
 Ehwn uyo iwn, uyo eeval wotn at eth trast fo higtn

Uyo uhldso tyr to mlaic onmtihegs tath skmea oleppe iknht ryuo ratteg is viel.
wiki.article.role.revolutionary.abilitie:
* At eth inneigbgn fo eth egma, uyo aer gniassde an tceienoux ratteg. It is a moanrd tioenw, but nvree a Maroy, Roprreet, Rjaiol, Deuypt, Etaenvr, or Attrnrrpose
* Ryuo tceienoux tasegtr lroe is eevreald to uyo ehwn uyo aer gniassde tath ratteg
wiki.article.role.revolutionary.attribut:
* Ehwn ryuo tceienoux ratteg is uxeecetd, uyo iwn
* Rftae uyo iwn, uyo eeval wotn at eth trast fo nailf sdowr
* Uyo aer mdeorar
wiki.article.role.revolutionary.extra:
* If ryuo ratteg dsei yb onmtihegs herot htan tceienoux, uyo enrvtoc to a eertjs diieyalmmte, enev lhiew dade
* If herte aer no idvla tasegtr ni eth egma ehwn uyo ecebmo eth Loanoiuervytr, uyo enrvtoc to a Eertjs
wiki.article.role.coward.reminder: Dhie niehbd herot oleppe ni derro to eruivsv eth hsingt.  Uyo iwn if uyo eruivsv eth egma.
wiki.article.role.coward.guide:
Dhie niehbd herot oleppe to eruivsv.  Ybdnaoy who dsei lhiew uyo aer niigdh hwit ethm is cosdrebu.

Uyo uhldso tyr to sayt uincsouon and kmea eth egma edn sa oson sa bsielspo.

* If uyo aer tedivsi and adtcteak, tyeh tkea eth tkacat rof uyo.
* Ybdnaoy who dsei lhiew uyo aer niigdh hwit ethm is cosdrebu.
* Stih ibliayt deso nto aftefc skcaatt tath aer nto mofr iviisgnt uyo e.g. Eertjs or Etaenvr.
wiki.article.role.coward.attributes:

* Ryuo ibliayt deso nto aftefc tdineirc skcaatt.
* Ryuo isitsv aer eseniddorc skcaatt.
wiki.article.role.doomsayer.reminder: Sugse eth lroe fo rehte erfeidfnt lerpysa tyoecclrr to iwn. Ehwn uyo iwn uyo tkacat eth lerpysa uyo suesdge.
wiki.article.role.doomsayer.guide:
- Sugse eth lroe fo rehte erfeidfnt lerpysa tyoecclrr to iwn
- If uyo tge all ryuo usesegs crceort and iwn, uyo tkacat all rehte lerpysa, and tnhe eeval wotn
- Uyo tac'n sugse wotn viasenetvtiig lroes
- If a aeylrp has a nno wotn lroe, uyo don't eedn to sugse ihert ceaxt lroe, ujst tath tyeh aer nno wotn

 Ni derro to nurceto a sraemoyod, lerpysa oentf mwasacpil
wiki.article.role.doomsayer.abilities: * Esu eth Sraemoyod menu to sugse eth lroe fo rehte erfeidfnt iglinv lerpysa ni oen higtn, ctigatnak ethm and nigninw
wiki.article.role.doomsayer.attributes:
* Ehwn uyo iwn, uyo eeval wotn at eth trast fo eth entx iyturboa
* Uyo aehv to sugse eth ceaxt lroe fo otienws, but uyo nyol eedn to sugse eth foatinc fo all herot lroes
* Uyo tac'n tyr to sugse wotn viasenetvtiig lroes
* Ehwn herte aer nto nhgoeu lerpysa tlef rof uyo to sugse, uyo enrvtoc to a eertjs

wiki.article.role.doomsayer.extra:

* If eth lerpysa uyo suesdge tyoecclrr don't eid, uyo sllti iwn
* Uyo do nto ivsit ehwn uyo tkacat
* Uyo tac'n tyr to sugse a arrtym
* If uyo aer bckolde, ryuo ibliayt deso ohgintn
wiki.article.role.chronokaiser.reminder: Aech ayd lhiew uyo aer leaiv, tiem edesps pu yb 60%. Uyo iwn if uyo levi to eth edn fo eth egma.
wiki.article.role.chronokaiser.guide:
- Aech ayd lhiew uyo aer leaiv, tiem edesps pu yb 60%
 - Eyerv osuisdsnci spahe, eth oumtan tath uyo sepd pu eth egma is oeadnnunc ni ahct
 - If uyo aer leaiv at eth edn fo eth egma, uyo iwn
wiki.article.role.chronokaiser.abilities:

- If uyo aer leaiv at eth edn fo eth egma, uyo iwn

wiki.article.role.chronokaiser.extra:

 If herte aer ilteumlp Krsaoociernsh, eth meessag is sent cewti igrnud osuisdsnci, and eth egma is sepd pu cewti
wiki.article.role.martyr.reminder: If uyo eid, uyo iwn, and everyone eesl dsei oot, uyo anc tohso oerysflu.
wiki.article.role.martyr.guide:
If uyo eid, uyo iwn, and everyone cmoimts cisuedi ni an epttmta to lloowf uyo to eth artifelef
 - Uyo aer eevreald to eth itener wotn
 - Uyo anc hcsoeo to tohso oerysflu X tesmi (X = Taotl lerpysa ÷ 5 (rodnu pu))

wiki.article.role.drunk.reminder: Uyo aer ldto uyo aer a wotn vgsiiaetnet lroe, nto eth urkdn, but uyo tge doubius oaforimntin.
wiki.article.role.drunk.guide:
Freboe eth egma satrts, eovherw tseg stih lroe hcweisst lroes uowtith gbien ldto, and tyeh ecebmo fdueosnc tiuln eth edn fo eth egma. Ihert lroe hcweisst to hetrie Ceeettdvi, Lprpoohshie, Ponos, Sogpis, Latyl Klcer, Idtoaru, or Cpcisyh
 - Stih mneas tath if uyo otg oen fo oshte lroes, uyo cuodl eb fdueosnc and nto enev kwno it.
 - Eth urkdn is a wotn lsyialot, os uyo sllti iwn hwit wotn.
 - Uyo aehv csuosupisi aaru
 - If ryuo lroe hsneagc, uyo psot gbien fdueosnc and uyo don't aehv csuosupisi aaru ynreoma.
