wiki.article.role.warden.extra: - Uyo don't ivsit ybdnaoy due to ryuo won ibliayt
wiki.article.role.yer.reminder: Aech higtn*, hetrie tkacat a aeylrp, or enrvtoc a aeylrp to eb a yre, and tkacat oerysflu.
wiki.article.role.yer.guide:
- At higtn hcsoeo to hetrie ahhpssefit or nto
    - If uyo don't ahhpssefit
        - Hcsoeo a aeylrp to tkacat hwit an maror inpceigr tkacat
    - If uyo ahhpssefit
        - Hcsoeo a aeylrp to enrvtoc hwit an eoc-mirpiargnr tkacat
        - If eth tkacat descsuce
            - Tath lerpysa lroe eomcbse yre            - Tath aeylrp ntveoscr to fdiesn lsyialot
            - Uyo tkacat oerysflu hwit a icprtntoeo inpceigr tkacat
            - If uyo eid, ryuo evrag ohsws eth lroe uyo isigdsude sa on it 
- Uyo anc nyol ahhpssefit X tesmi (X = Taotl lerpysa ÷ 5 (rodnu pu))
wiki.article.role.yer.extra:
- Uyo ivsit eth aeylrp uyo hcsoeo
- Uyo tac'n tkacat or enrvtoc higtn 1
wiki.article.role.fiendsWildcard.reminde: Hcsoeo a fdiesn lroe to ecebmo at trast fo higtn.
wiki.article.role.fiendsWildcard.guide:
* Hcsoeo a fdiesn lroe to ecebmo tath lroe
    * Uyo ecebmo tath lroe ehwn higtn satrts
* Uyo tac'n ecebmo a lroe tath has dcxeeede tis lroe mtili
wiki.article.role.fiendsWildcard.abiliti: * Ecebmo a lroe uyo hcsoeo at eth trast fo higtn
wiki.article.role.fiendsWildcard.attribu:
* Uyo anc nto ecebmo a lroe tath is dbedlsia
* Uyo anc nto ecebmo a lroe tath is netak yb oot mnay lerpysa
wiki.article.role.fiendsWildcard.extra:
* If uyo hcsoeo a lroe tath aws dbedlsia uyo sayt sa eth Fdiesn Idladwrc
* Uyo anc hcsoeo Fdiesn Idladwrc to sayt sa Fdiesn Idladwrc
* Uyo tac'n ecebmo a lroe tath is at tis lroe mtili
wiki.article.role.apostle.reminder: Aech higtn, arcry out eth tkas fo eth cult.
wiki.article.role.apostle.guide:
- At higtn, hetrie likl or enrvtoc
    - If eth cult anc enrvtoc tonghti, ltesec a aeylrp to enrvtoc
    - If eth cult anc likl tonghti and herte is no leztao, ltesec a aeylrp to likl
wiki.article.role.apostle.abilities:
* On hsingt eth cult lilsk
    * If uyo aer eth nyol usctlti, ivsit a aeylrp to tkacat
* On hsingt eth cult enrvtoc
    * Ivsit a aeylrp to enrvtoc ethm to a Leztao on eth usctlti tmae
wiki.article.role.apostle.attributes: * Uyo tac'n enrvtoc a aeylrp who has nya eefsden
wiki.article.role.apostle.extra:
* Herte anc nyol eb oen Elsoapt, if uyo eid, eth entx ldseot usctlti eomcbse an Elsoapt
*  Ceno uyo enrvtoc a aeylrp to a leztao, eth rsievpuo leztao (if nya) eomcbse a lsdipiec
* Uyo anc nto ltesec herot tcsliust
- Icnevrognt is nto an ctigatnak ivsit, but ctigatnak is
wiki.article.role.disciple.guide:
- If an Elsoapt dsei, and uyo aer eth entx ldseot usctlti, uyo aer cetrdnvoe to an Elsoapt
    - Ldseot usctlti mneas tath uyo weer a usctlti freboe nya herot aeylrp aws, and if herte is a tei, tnhe eth aeylrp hwit a woelr aeylrp eubrmn is eth ldseot

Enev huohgt uyo aehv no ibliayt uyo aer aesnltsei to ryuo tmae. Uyo uhldso iel and moienctcmau hwit ewlfol tcsliust to eoncnivc eth wotn to eceutxe eomeons who ints' a usctlti.
wiki.article.role.disciple.abilities: * Ehwn an Elsoapt dsei and uyo aer eth ldseot usctlti, uyo illw ecebmo an Elsoapt
wiki.article.role.disciple.attributes: * Eth ldseot usctlti is eth oen tath has been a usctlti eth negtosl. If herte is a tei, eth ldseot usctlti is eth oen hwit eth etlwos aeylrp eubrmn
wiki.article.role.zealot.reminder: On cult likl hsingt, uyo tkacat a aeylrp tniseda fo eth elsoapt ctigatnak a aeylrp.
wiki.article.role.zealot.guide:
- At higtn, if eth cult is ilnilgk tonghti, ltesec a aeylrp to tkacat ethm
- Uyo ecebmo a lsdipiec ehwn aoenthr aeylrp is cetrdnvoe to leztao

Kmea suer uyo don't hcsoeo eth amse aeylrp sa an Elsoapt, eacsube tnhe uyo thimg likl a usctlti.
wiki.article.role.zealot.abilities: * If it is a higtn eth cult lilsk, ivsit a aeylrp to tkacat
wiki.article.role.zealot.attributes: * Ehwn aoenthr aeylrp is cetrdnvoe to a leztao, uyo ecebmo a lsdipiec.
wiki.article.role.zealot.extra:
* Herte anc nvree eb mroe htan oen leztao
* Uyo anc nto ltesec herot tcsliust
